199 // Limit the number of iterations for next upgrade_time calculations.
200 // This also sets the percentage of monsters that will never upgrade.
201 // The rough formula is 2^(-x), e.g. for x = 5 it's 0.03125 (~ 3%).
202 static constexpr int UPGRADE_MAX_ITERS = 5;

227 // adjusts damage unit depending on type by enchantments.
228 static void armor_enchantment_adjust( monster &mon, damage_unit &du )
229 {
230  //If we're not dealing any damage of the given type, don't even bother.
231  if( du.amount < 0.1f ) {
232  return;
233  }
234  // FIXME: hardcoded damage types -> enchantments
235  if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "acid" ) ) ) {
236  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_ACID );
237  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "bash" ) ) ) {
238  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_BASH );
239  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "biological" ) ) ) {
240  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_BIO );
241  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "cold" ) ) ) {
242  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_COLD );
243  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "cut" ) ) ) {
244  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_CUT );
245  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "electric" ) ) ) {
246  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_ELEC );
247  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "heat" ) ) ) {
248  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_HEAT );
249  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "stab" ) ) ) {
250  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_STAB );
251  } else if( du.type == STATIC( damage_type_id( "bullet" ) ) ) {
252  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_BULLET );
253  }
254  if( du.type != STATIC( damage_type_id( "pure" ) ) ) {
255  du.amount = mon.calculate_by_enchantment( du.amount, enchant_vals::mod::ARMOR_ALL );
256  }
257  du.amount = std::max( 0.0f, du.amount );
258 }

288 monster::monster( const mtype_id &id ) : monster()
289 {
290  type = &id.obj();
291  moves = type->speed;
292  Creature::set_speed_base( type->speed );
293  hp = type->hp;
294  for( const auto &sa : type->special_attacks ) {
295  mon_special_attack &entry = special_attacks[sa.first];
296  entry.cooldown = rng( 0, sa.second->cooldown );
297  }
298  anger = type->agro;
299  morale = type->morale;
300  stomach_size = type->stomach_size;
301  faction = type->default_faction;
302  upgrades = type->upgrades && ( type->half_life || type->age_grow );
303  reproduces = type->reproduces && type->baby_timer && !monster::has_flag( mon_flag_NO_BREED );
304  biosignatures = type->biosignatures;
305  if( monster::has_flag( mon_flag_AQUATIC ) ) {
306  fish_population = dice( 1, 20 );
307  }
308  if( monster::has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
309  itype_id mech_bat = itype_id( type->mech_battery );
310  const itype &type = *item::find_type( mech_bat );
311  int max_charge = type.magazine->capacity;
312  item mech_bat_item = item( mech_bat, calendar::turn_zero );
313  mech_bat_item.ammo_consume( rng( 0, max_charge ), tripoint_zero, nullptr );
314  battery_item = cata::make_value<item>( mech_bat_item );
315  }
316  if( monster::has_flag( mon_flag_PET_MOUNTABLE ) ) {
317  if( !type->mount_items.tied.is_empty() ) {
318  itype_id tied_item_id = itype_id( type->mount_items.tied );
319  item tied_item_item = item( tied_item_id, calendar::turn_zero );
320  add_effect( effect_leashed, 1_turns, true );
321  tied_item = cata::make_value<item>( tied_item_item );
322  }
323  if( !type->mount_items.tack.is_empty() ) {
324  itype_id tack_item_id = itype_id( type->mount_items.tack );
325  item tack_item_item = item( tack_item_id, calendar::turn_zero );
326  add_effect( effect_monster_saddled, 1_turns, true );
327  tack_item = cata::make_value<item>( tack_item_item );
328  }
329  if( !type->mount_items.armor.is_empty() ) {
330  itype_id armor_item_id = itype_id( type->mount_items.armor );
331  item armor_item_item = item( armor_item_id, calendar::turn_zero );
332  add_effect( effect_monster_armor, 1_turns, true );
333  armor_item = cata::make_value<item>( armor_item_item );
334  }
335  if( !type->mount_items.storage.is_empty() ) {
336  itype_id storage_item_id = itype_id( type->mount_items.storage );
337  item storage_item_item = item( storage_item_id, calendar::turn_zero );
338  add_effect( effect_has_bag, 1_turns, true );
339  tack_item = cata::make_value<item>( storage_item_item );
340  }
341  }
342  aggro_character = type->aggro_character;
343 }

357 void monster::on_move( const tripoint_abs_ms &old_pos )
358 {
359  Creature::on_move( old_pos );
360  if( old_pos == get_location() ) {
361  return;
362  }
363  g->update_zombie_pos( *this, old_pos, get_location() );
364  if( has_effect( effect_ridden ) && mounted_player &&
365  mounted_player->get_location() != get_location() ) {
366  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "Ridden monster %s moved independently and dumped player",
367  get_name() );
368  mounted_player->forced_dismount();
369  }
370  if( has_dest() && get_location() == get_dest() ) {
371  unset_dest();
372  }
373 }
374 
375 void monster::poly( const mtype_id &id )
376 {
377  double hp_percentage = static_cast<double>( hp ) / static_cast<double>( type->hp );
378  if( !no_extra_death_drops ) {
379  generate_inventory();
380  }
381  type = &id.obj();
382  moves = 0;
383  Creature::set_speed_base( type->speed );
384  anger = type->agro;
385  morale = type->morale;
386  hp = static_cast<int>( hp_percentage * type->hp );
387  special_attacks.clear();
388  for( const auto &sa : type->special_attacks ) {
389  mon_special_attack &entry = special_attacks[sa.first];
390  entry.cooldown = sa.second->cooldown;
391  }
392  faction = type->default_faction;
393  upgrades = type->upgrades;
394  reproduces = type->reproduces;
395  biosignatures = type->biosignatures;
396  aggro_character = type->aggro_character;
397 }
398 
399 bool monster::can_upgrade() const
400 {
401  return upgrades && get_option<float>( "MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR" ) > 0.0;
402 }
403 
404 // For master special attack.
405 void monster::hasten_upgrade()
406 {
407  if( !can_upgrade() || upgrade_time < 1 ) {
408  return;
409  }
410 
411  const int scaled_half_life = type->half_life * get_option<float>( "MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR" );
412  upgrade_time -= rng( 1, scaled_half_life );
413  if( upgrade_time < 0 ) {
414  upgrade_time = 0;
415  }
416 }
417 
418 int monster::get_upgrade_time() const
419 {
420  return upgrade_time;
421 }
422 
423 // Sets time to upgrade to 0.
424 void monster::allow_upgrade()
425 {
426  upgrade_time = 0;
427 }
428 
429 // This will disable upgrades in case max iters have been reached.
430 // Checking for return value of -1 is necessary.
431 int monster::next_upgrade_time()
432 {
433  if( type->age_grow > 0 ) {
434  return type->age_grow;
435  }
436  const int scaled_half_life = type->half_life * get_option<float>( "MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR" );
437  int day = 1; // 1 day of guaranteed evolve time
438  for( int i = 0; i < UPGRADE_MAX_ITERS; i++ ) {
439  if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
440  day += rng( 0, scaled_half_life );
441  return day;
442  } else {
443  day += scaled_half_life;
444  }
445  }
446  // didn't manage to upgrade, shouldn't ever then
447  upgrades = false;
448  return -1;
449 }
450 
451 void monster::try_upgrade( bool pin_time )
452 {
453  if( !can_upgrade() ) {
454  return;
455  }
456 
457  const int current_day = to_days<int>( calendar::turn - calendar::turn_zero );
458  //This should only occur when a monster is created or upgraded to a new form
459  if( upgrade_time < 0 ) {
460  upgrade_time = next_upgrade_time();
461  if( upgrade_time < 0 ) {
462  return;
463  }
464  if( pin_time || type->age_grow > 0 ) {
465  // offset by today, always true for growing creatures
466  upgrade_time += current_day;
467  } else {
468  // offset by starting season
469  // TODO: revisit this and make it simpler
470  upgrade_time += to_days<int>( calendar::start_of_cataclysm - calendar::turn_zero );
471  }
472  }
473 
474  // Here we iterate until we either are before upgrade_time or can't upgrade any more.
475  // This is so that late into game new monsters can 'catch up' with all that half-life
476  // upgrades they'd get if we were simulating whole world.
477  while( true ) {
478  if( upgrade_time > current_day ) {
479  // not yet
480  return;
481  }
482 
483  if( type->upgrade_into ) {
484  //If we upgrade into a blacklisted monster, treat it as though we are non-upgradeable
485  if( MonsterGroupManager::monster_is_blacklisted( type->upgrade_into ) ) {
486  return;
487  }
488  poly( type->upgrade_into );
489  } else {
490  mtype_id new_type;
491  if( type->upgrade_multi_range ) {
492  bool ret_default = false;
493  std::vector<MonsterGroupResult> res = MonsterGroupManager::GetResultFromGroup(
494  type->upgrade_group, nullptr, nullptr, false, &ret_default );
495  if( !res.empty() && !ret_default ) {
496  // Set the type to poly the current monster (preserves inventory)
497  new_type = res.front().name;
498  res.front().pack_size--;
499  for( const MonsterGroupResult &mgr : res ) {
500  if( !mgr.name ) {
501  continue;
502  }
503  for( int i = 0; i < mgr.pack_size; i++ ) {
504  tripoint spawn_pos;
505  if( g->find_nearby_spawn_point( pos(), mgr.name, 1, *type->upgrade_multi_range,
506  spawn_pos, false, false ) ) {
507  monster *spawned = g->place_critter_at( mgr.name, spawn_pos );
508  if( spawned ) {
509  spawned->friendly = friendly;
510  }
511  }
512  }
513  }
514  }
515  } else {
516  new_type = MonsterGroupManager::GetRandomMonsterFromGroup( type->upgrade_group );
517  }
518  if( !new_type.is_empty() ) {
519  if( new_type ) {
520  poly( new_type );
521  } else {
522  // "upgrading" to mon_null
523  if( type->upgrade_null_despawn ) {
524  g->remove_zombie( *this );
525  } else {
526  die( nullptr );
527  }
528  return;
529  }
530  }
531  }
532 
533  if( !upgrades ) {
534  // upgraded into a non-upgradeable monster
535  return;
536  }
537 
538  const int next_upgrade = next_upgrade_time();
539  if( next_upgrade < 0 ) {
540  // hit never_upgrade
541  return;
542  }
543  upgrade_time += next_upgrade;
544  }
545 }
546 
547 void monster::try_reproduce()
548 {
549  if( !reproduces ) {
550  return;
551  }
552  // This can happen if the monster type has changed (from reproducing to non-reproducing monster)
553  if( !type->baby_timer ) {
554  return;
555  }
556 
557  if( !baby_timer && amount_eaten >= stomach_size ) {
558  // Assume this is a freshly spawned monster (because baby_timer is not set yet), set the point when it reproduce to somewhere in the future.
559  // Monsters need to have eaten eat to start their pregnancy timer, but that's all.
560  baby_timer.emplace( calendar::turn + *type->baby_timer );
561  }
562 
563  bool season_spawn = false;
564  bool season_match = true;
565 
566  // only 50% of animals should reproduce
567  bool female = one_in( 2 );
568  for( const std::string &elem : type->baby_flags ) {
569  if( elem == "SUMMER" || elem == "WINTER" || elem == "SPRING" || elem == "AUTUMN" ) {
570  season_spawn = true;
571  }
572  }
573 
574  map &here = get_map();
575  // add a decreasing chance of additional spawns when "catching up" an existing animal.
576  int chance = -1;
577  while( true ) {
578  if( !baby_timer.has_value() || *baby_timer > calendar::turn ) {
579  return;
580  }
581 
582  if( season_spawn ) {
583  season_match = false;
584  for( const std::string &elem : type->baby_flags ) {
585  if( ( season_of_year( *baby_timer ) == SUMMER && elem == "SUMMER" ) ||
586  ( season_of_year( *baby_timer ) == WINTER && elem == "WINTER" ) ||
587  ( season_of_year( *baby_timer ) == SPRING && elem == "SPRING" ) ||
588  ( season_of_year( *baby_timer ) == AUTUMN && elem == "AUTUMN" ) ) {
589  season_match = true;
590  }
591  }
592  }
593 
594  chance += 2;
595  if( has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) && has_effect( effect_critter_underfed ) ) {
596  chance += 1; //Reduce the chances but don't prevent birth if the animal is not eating.
597  }
598  if( season_match && female && one_in( chance ) ) {
599  int spawn_cnt = rng( 1, type->baby_count );
600  if( type->baby_monster ) {
601  here.add_spawn( type->baby_monster, spawn_cnt, pos_bub() );
602  } else {
603  const item egg( type->baby_egg, *baby_timer );
604  for( int i = 0; i < spawn_cnt; i++ ) {
605  here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), egg, true );
606  }
607  }
608  }
609  *baby_timer += *type->baby_timer;
610  }
611 }
612 
613 void monster::refill_udders()
614 {
615  if( type->starting_ammo.empty() ) {
616  debugmsg( "monster %s has no starting ammo to refill udders", get_name() );
617  return;
618  }
619  if( ammo.empty() ) {
620  // legacy animals got empty ammo map, fill them up now if needed.
621  ammo[type->starting_ammo.begin()->first] = type->starting_ammo.begin()->second;
622  }
623  auto current_milk = ammo.find( itype_milk_raw );
624  if( current_milk == ammo.end() ) {
625  current_milk = ammo.find( itype_milk );
626  if( current_milk != ammo.end() ) {
627  // take this opportunity to update milk udders to raw_milk
628  ammo[itype_milk_raw] = current_milk->second;
629  // Erase old key-value from map
630  ammo.erase( current_milk );
631  }
632  }
633  // if we got here, we got milk.
634  if( current_milk->second == type->starting_ammo.begin()->second ) {
635  // already full up
636  return;
637  }
638  if( !has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) || has_effect( effect_critter_well_fed ) ) {
639  if( calendar::turn - udder_timer > 1_days ) {
640  // You milk once a day. Monsters with the EATS flag need to be well fed or they won't refill their udders.
641  ammo.begin()->second = type->starting_ammo.begin()->second;
642  udder_timer = calendar::turn;
643  }
644  }
645 }
646 
647 void monster::reset_digestion()
648 {
649  if( calendar::turn - stomach_timer > 3_days ) {
650  //If the player hasn't been around, assume critters have been operating at a subsistence level.
651  //Otherwise everything will constantly be underfed. We only run this on load to prevent problems.
652  remove_effect( effect_critter_underfed );
653  remove_effect( effect_critter_well_fed );
654  amount_eaten = 0;
655  stomach_timer = calendar::turn;
656  }
657 }
658 
659 void monster::digest_food()
660 {
661  if( calendar::turn - stomach_timer > 1_days ) {
662  if( ( amount_eaten >= stomach_size ) && !has_effect( effect_critter_underfed ) ) {
663  add_effect( effect_critter_well_fed, 24_hours );
664  } else if( ( amount_eaten < ( stomach_size / 10 ) ) && !has_effect( effect_critter_well_fed ) ) {
665  add_effect( effect_critter_underfed, 24_hours );
666  }
667  amount_eaten = 0;
668  stomach_timer = calendar::turn;
669  }
670 }
671 
672 void monster::try_biosignature()
673 {
674  if( is_hallucination() ) {
675  return;
676  }
677 
678  if( !biosignatures ) {
679  return;
680  }
681  if( !type->biosig_timer ) {
682  return;
683  }
684  if( has_effect( effect_critter_underfed ) ) {
685  return;
686  }
687 
688  if( !biosig_timer ) {
689  biosig_timer.emplace( calendar::turn + *type->biosig_timer );
690  }
691  map &here = get_map();
692  int counter = 0;
693  while( true ) {
694  // don't catch up too much, otherwise on some scenarios,
695  // we could have years worth of poop just deposited on the floor.
696  if( *biosig_timer > calendar::turn || counter > 50 ) {
697  return;
698  }
699  here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), item( type->biosig_item, *biosig_timer, 1 ), true );
700  *biosig_timer += *type->biosig_timer;
701  counter += 1;
702  }
703 }

722 std::string monster::name( unsigned int quantity ) const
723 {
724  if( !type ) {
725  debugmsg( "monster::name empty type!" );
726  return std::string();
727  }
728  std::string result = type->nname( quantity );
729  if( !nickname.empty() ) {
730  return nickname;
731  }
732  if( !unique_name.empty() ) {
733  //~ %1$s: monster name, %2$s: unique name
734  result = string_format( pgettext( "unique monster name", "%1$s: %2$s" ),
735  result, unique_name );
736  }
737  if( !mission_fused.empty() ) {
738  //~ name when a monster fuses with a mission target
739  result = string_format( pgettext( "fused mission monster", "*%s" ), result );
740  }
741  return result;
742 }

744 // TODO: MATERIALS put description in materials.json?
745 std::string monster::name_with_armor() const
746 {
747  std::string ret;
748  if( made_of( material_iflesh ) ) {
749  ret = _( "carapace" );
750  } else if( made_of( material_veggy ) ) {
751  ret = _( "thick bark" );
752  } else if( made_of( material_bone ) ) {
753  ret = _( "exoskeleton" );
754  } else if( made_of( material_flesh ) || made_of( material_hflesh ) ) {
755  ret = _( "thick hide" );
756  } else if( made_of( material_iron ) || made_of( material_steel ) ) {
757  ret = _( "armor plating" );
758  } else if( made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
759  ret = _( "dense jelly mass" );
760  } else {
761  ret = _( "armor" );
762  }
763  if( has_effect( effect_monster_armor ) && !inv.empty() ) {
764  for( const item &armor : inv ) {
765  if( armor.is_pet_armor( true ) ) {
766  ret += string_format( _( "wearing %1$s" ), armor.tname( 1 ) );
767  break;
768  }
769  }
770  }
771 
772  return ret;
773 }

802 
803 static std::pair<std::string, nc_color> hp_description( int cur_hp, int max_hp )
804 {
805  std::string damage_info;
806  nc_color col;
807  if( cur_hp >= max_hp ) {
808  damage_info = _( "It is uninjured." );
809  col = c_green;
810  } else if( cur_hp >= max_hp * 0.8 ) {
811  damage_info = _( "It is lightly injured." );
812  col = c_light_green;
813  } else if( cur_hp >= max_hp * 0.6 ) {
814  damage_info = _( "It is moderately injured." );
815  col = c_yellow;
816  } else if( cur_hp >= max_hp * 0.3 ) {
817  damage_info = _( "It is heavily injured." );
818  col = c_yellow;
819  } else if( cur_hp >= max_hp * 0.1 ) {
820  damage_info = _( "It is severely injured." );
821  col = c_light_red;
822  } else {
823  damage_info = _( "It is nearly dead!" );
824  col = c_red;
825  }
826 
827  if( debug_mode ) {
828  damage_info += " ";
829  damage_info += string_format( _( "%1$d/%2$d HP" ), cur_hp, max_hp );
830  }
831 
832  return std::make_pair( damage_info, col );
833 }
834 
835 std::string monster::speed_description( float mon_speed_rating,
836  bool immobile,
837  const speed_description_id &speed_desc )
838 {
839  if( speed_desc.is_null() || !speed_desc.is_valid() ) {
840  return std::string();
841  }
842 
843  const avatar &ply = get_avatar();
844  double player_runcost = ply.run_cost( 100 );
845  if( player_runcost <= 0.00 ) {
846  player_runcost = 0.01f;
847  }
848 
849  // tpt = tiles per turn
850  const double player_tpt = ply.get_speed() / player_runcost;
851  double ratio_tpt = player_tpt == 0.00 ?
852  100.00 : mon_speed_rating / player_tpt;
853  ratio_tpt *= immobile ? 0.00 : 1.00;
854 
855  for( const speed_description_value &speed_value : speed_desc->values() ) {
856  if( ratio_tpt >= speed_value.value() ) {
857  return random_entry( speed_value.descriptions(), translation() ).translated();
858  }
859  }
860 
861  return std::string();
862 }
863 
864 int monster::print_info( const catacurses::window &w, int vStart, int vLines, int column ) const
865 {
866  const int vEnd = vStart + vLines;
867  const int max_width = getmaxx( w ) - column - 1;
868  std::ostringstream oss;
869 
870  oss << get_tag_from_color( c_white ) << _( "Origin: " );
871  oss << enumerate_as_string( type->src.begin(),
872  type->src.end(), []( const std::pair<mtype_id, mod_id> &source ) {
873  return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
874  }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
875  oss << "</color>" << "\n";
876 
877  if( debug_mode ) {
878  oss << colorize( type->id.str(), c_white );
879  }
880  oss << "\n";
881 
882  // Print health bar, monster name, then statuses on the first line.
883  nc_color bar_color = c_white;
884  std::string bar_str;
885  get_HP_Bar( bar_color, bar_str );
886  oss << get_tag_from_color( bar_color ) << bar_str << "</color>";
887  oss << "<color_white>" << std::string( 5 - utf8_width( bar_str ), '.' ) << "</color> ";
888  oss << get_tag_from_color( basic_symbol_color() ) << name() << "</color> ";
889  oss << "<color_h_white>" << get_effect_status() << "</color>";
890  vStart += fold_and_print( w, point( column, vStart ), max_width, c_white, oss.str() );
891 
892  Character &pc = get_player_character();
893  bool sees_player = sees( pc );
894  const bool player_knows = !pc.has_trait( trait_INATTENTIVE );
895 
896  // Hostility indicator on the second line.
897  std::pair<std::string, nc_color> att = get_attitude();
898  if( player_knows ) {
899  mvwprintz( w, point( column, vStart++ ), att.second, att.first );
900  }
901 
902  // Awareness indicator in the third line.
903  std::string senses_str = sees_player ? _( "Can see to your current location" ) :
904  _( "Can't see to your current location" );
905 
906  if( player_knows ) {
907  vStart += fold_and_print( w, point( column, vStart ), max_width, player_knows &&
908  sees_player ? c_red : c_green,
909  senses_str );
910  }
911 
912  const std::string speed_desc = speed_description(
913  speed_rating(),
914  has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE ),
915  type->speed_desc );
916  vStart += fold_and_print( w, point( column, vStart ), max_width, c_white, speed_desc );
917 
918  // Monster description on following lines.
919  std::vector<std::string> lines = foldstring( type->get_description(), max_width );
920  int numlines = lines.size();
921  for( int i = 0; i < numlines && vStart < vEnd; i++ ) {
922  mvwprintz( w, point( column, vStart++ ), c_light_gray, lines[i] );
923  }
924 
925  if( !mission_fused.empty() ) {
926  // Mission monsters fused into this monster
927  const std::string fused_desc = string_format( _( "Parts of %s protrude from its body." ),
928  enumerate_as_string( mission_fused ) );
929  lines = foldstring( fused_desc, max_width );
930  numlines = lines.size();
931  for( int i = 0; i < numlines && vStart < vEnd; i++ ) {
932  mvwprintz( w, point( column, ++vStart ), c_light_gray, lines[i] );
933  }
934  }
935 
936  // Riding indicator on next line after description.
937  if( has_effect( effect_ridden ) && mounted_player ) {
938  mvwprintz( w, point( column, ++vStart ), c_white, _( "Rider: %s" ), mounted_player->disp_name() );
939  }
940 
941  // Show monster size on the last line
942  if( size_bonus > 0 ) {
943  mvwprintz( w, point( column, ++vStart ), c_light_gray, _( " It is %s." ),
944  size_names.at( get_size() ) );
945  }
946 
947  if( get_option<bool>( "ENABLE_ASCII_ART" ) ) {
948  const ascii_art_id art = type->get_picture_id();
949  if( art.is_valid() ) {
950  for( const std::string &line : art->picture ) {
951  fold_and_print( w, point( column, ++vStart ), max_width, c_white, line );
952  }
953  }
954  }
955  return ++vStart;
956 }
957 
958 std::string monster::extended_description() const
959 {
960  std::string ss;
961  Character &pc = get_player_character();
962  const bool player_knows = !pc.has_trait( trait_INATTENTIVE );
963  const std::pair<std::string, nc_color> att = get_attitude();
964 
965  std::string att_colored = colorize( att.first, att.second );
966  std::string difficulty_str;
967  if( debug_mode ) {
968  difficulty_str = _( "Difficulty " ) + std::to_string( type->difficulty );
969  } else {
970  if( type->difficulty < 3 ) {
971  difficulty_str = _( "<color_light_gray>Minimal threat.</color>" );
972  } else if( type->difficulty < 10 ) {
973  difficulty_str = _( "<color_light_gray>Mildly dangerous.</color>" );
974  } else if( type->difficulty < 20 ) {
975  difficulty_str = _( "<color_light_red>Dangerous.</color>" );
976  } else if( type->difficulty < 30 ) {
977  difficulty_str = _( "<color_red>Very dangerous.</color>" );
978  } else if( type->difficulty < 50 ) {
979  difficulty_str = _( "<color_red>Extremely dangerous.</color>" );
980  } else {
981  difficulty_str = _( "<color_red>Fatally dangerous!</color>" );
982  }
983  }
984 
985  ss += _( "Origin: " );
986  ss += enumerate_as_string( type->src.begin(),
987  type->src.end(), []( const std::pair<mtype_id, mod_id> &source ) {
988  return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
989  }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
990 
991  ss += "\n--\n";
992 
993  if( debug_mode ) {
994  ss += type->id.str();
995  ss += "\n";
996  }
997 
998  ss += string_format( _( "This is a %s. %s%s" ), name(),
999  player_knows ? att_colored + " " : std::string(),
1000  difficulty_str ) + "\n";
1001  if( !get_effect_status().empty() ) {
1002  ss += string_format( _( "<stat>It is %s.</stat>" ), get_effect_status() ) + "\n";
1003  }
1004 
1005  ss += "--\n";
1006  const std::pair<std::string, nc_color> hp_bar = hp_description( hp, type->hp );
1007  ss += colorize( hp_bar.first, hp_bar.second ) + "\n";
1008 
1009  const std::string speed_desc = speed_description(
1010  speed_rating(),
1011  has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE ),
1012  type->speed_desc );
1013  ss += speed_desc + "\n";
1014 
1015  ss += "--\n";
1016  ss += string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", type->get_description() ) + "\n";
1017  ss += "--\n";
1018  if( !mission_fused.empty() ) {
1019  // Mission monsters fused into this monster
1020  const std::string fused_desc = string_format( _( "Parts of %s protrude from its body." ),
1021  enumerate_as_string( mission_fused ) );
1022  ss += string_format( "<dark>%s</dark>", fused_desc ) + "\n";
1023  ss += "--\n";
1024  }
1025 
1026  ss += string_format( _( "It is %s in size." ),
1027  size_names.at( get_size() ) ) + "\n";
1028 
1029  std::vector<std::string> types = type->species_descriptions();
1030  if( type->has_flag( mon_flag_ANIMAL ) ) {
1031  types.emplace_back( _( "an animal" ) );
1032  }
1033  if( !types.empty() ) {
1034  ss += string_format( _( "It is %s." ),
1035  enumerate_as_string( types ) ) + "\n";
1036  }
1037 
1038  using flag_description = std::pair<const mon_flag_id, std::string>;
1039  const auto describe_flags = [this, &ss](
1040  const std::string_view format,
1041  const std::vector<flag_description> &flags_names,
1042  const std::string &if_empty = "" ) {
1043  std::string flag_descriptions = enumerate_as_string( flags_names.begin(),
1044  flags_names.end(), [this]( const flag_description & fd ) {
1045  return type->has_flag( fd.first ) ? fd.second : "";
1046  } );
1047  if( !flag_descriptions.empty() ) {
1048  ss += string_format( format, flag_descriptions ) + "\n";
1049  } else if( !if_empty.empty() ) {
1050  ss += if_empty + "\n";
1051  }
1052  };
1053 
1054  using property_description = std::pair<bool, std::string>;
1055  const auto describe_properties = [&ss](
1056  const std::string_view format,
1057  const std::vector<property_description> &property_names,
1058  const std::string &if_empty = "" ) {
1059  std::string property_descriptions = enumerate_as_string( property_names.begin(),
1060  property_names.end(), []( const property_description & pd ) {
1061  return pd.first ? pd.second : "";
1062  } );
1063  if( !property_descriptions.empty() ) {
1064  ss += string_format( format, property_descriptions ) + "\n";
1065  } else if( !if_empty.empty() ) {
1066  ss += if_empty + "\n";
1067  }
1068  };
1069 
1070  describe_flags( _( "It has the following senses: %s." ), {
1071  {mon_flag_HEARS, pgettext( "Hearing as sense", "hearing" )},
1072  {mon_flag_SEES, pgettext( "Sight as sense", "sight" )},
1073  {mon_flag_SMELLS, pgettext( "Smell as sense", "smell" )},
1074  }, _( "It doesn't have senses." ) );
1075 
1076  describe_properties( _( "It can %s." ), {
1077  {swims(), pgettext( "Swim as an action", "swim" )},
1078  {flies(), pgettext( "Fly as an action", "fly" )},
1079  {can_dig(), pgettext( "Dig as an action", "dig" )},
1080  {climbs(), pgettext( "Climb as an action", "climb" )}
1081  } );
1082 
1083  describe_flags( _( "<bad>In fight it can %s.</bad>" ), {
1084  {mon_flag_GRABS, pgettext( "Grab as an action", "grab" )},
1085  {mon_flag_VENOM, pgettext( "Poison as an action", "poison" )},
1086  {mon_flag_PARALYZEVENOM, pgettext( "Paralyze as an action", "paralyze" )}
1087  } );
1088 
1089  if( !type->has_flag( mon_flag_NOHEAD ) ) {
1090  ss += std::string( _( "It has a head." ) ) + "\n";
1091  }
1092 
1093  if( debug_mode ) {
1094  ss += "--\n";
1095 
1096  ss += string_format( _( "Current Speed: %1$d" ), get_speed() ) + "\n";
1097  ss += string_format( _( "Anger: %1$d" ), anger ) + "\n";
1098  ss += string_format( _( "Friendly: %1$d" ), friendly ) + "\n";
1099  ss += string_format( _( "Morale: %1$d" ), morale ) + "\n";
1100  if( aggro_character ) {
1101  ss += string_format( _( "<color_red>Aggressive towards characters</color>" ) ) + "\n";
1102  }
1103 
1104  const time_duration current_time = calendar::turn - calendar::turn_zero;
1105  ss += string_format( _( "Current Time: Turn %1$d | Day: %2$d" ),
1106  to_turns<int>( current_time ),
1107  to_days<int>( current_time ) ) + "\n";
1108 
1109  ss += string_format( _( "Upgrade time: %1$d (turns left %2$d) %3$s" ),
1110  upgrade_time,
1111  to_turns<int>( time_duration::from_days( upgrade_time ) - current_time ),
1112  can_upgrade() ? "" : _( "<color_red>(can't upgrade)</color>" ) ) + "\n";
1113 
1114  if( !special_attacks.empty() ) {
1115  ss += string_format( _( "%d special attack(s): " ), special_attacks.size() );
1116  for( const auto &attack : special_attacks ) {
1117  ss += string_format( _( "%s, cooldown %d; " ), attack.first.c_str(), attack.second.cooldown );
1118  }
1119  ss += "\n";
1120  }
1121 
1122  if( baby_timer.has_value() ) {
1123  ss += string_format( _( "Reproduce time: %1$d (turns left %2$d) %3$s" ),
1124  to_turn<int>( baby_timer.value() ),
1125  to_turn<int>( baby_timer.value() - current_time ),
1126  reproduces ? "" : _( "<color_red>(can't reproduce)</color>" ) ) + "\n";
1127  }
1128 
1129  if( biosig_timer.has_value() ) {
1130  ss += string_format( _( "Biosignature time: %1$d (turns left %2$d) %3$s" ),
1131  to_turn<int>( biosig_timer.value() ),
1132  to_turn<int>( biosig_timer.value() - current_time ),
1133  biosignatures ? "" : _( "<color_red>(no biosignature)</color>" ) ) + "\n";
1134  }
1135 
1136  if( lifespan_end.has_value() ) {
1137  ss += string_format( _( "Lifespan end time: %1$d (turns left %2$d)" ),
1138  to_turn<int>( lifespan_end.value() ),
1139  to_turn<int>( lifespan_end.value() - current_time ) );
1140  } else {
1141  ss += "Lifespan end time: n/a <color_yellow>(indefinite)</color>";
1142  }
1143  }
1144 
1145  return replace_colors( ss );
1146 }

1168 nc_color monster::color_with_effects() const
1169 {

1171  if( has_effect( effect_beartrap ) || has_effect( effect_stunned ) ||

1173  has_effect( effect_tied ) ||

1185 
1186 bool monster::avoid_trap( const tripoint & /* pos */, const trap &tr ) const
1187 {
1188  // The trap position is not used, monsters are to stupid to remember traps. Actually, they do
1189  // not even see them.
1190  // Traps are on the ground, digging monsters go below, fliers and climbers go above.
1191  if( digging() || flies() ) {
1192  return true;
1193  }
1194 
1195  if( type->trap_avoids.count( tr.id ) > 0 ) {
1196  return true;
1197  }
1198 
1199  return dice( 3, type->sk_dodge + 1 ) >= dice( 3, tr.get_avoidance() );
1200 }

1285 int monster::sight_range( const float light_level ) const
1286 {
1287  // Non-aquatic monsters can't see much when submerged
1288  if( !can_see() || effect_cache[VISION_IMPAIRED] ||
1289  ( underwater && !swims() && !has_flag( mon_flag_AQUATIC ) && !digging() ) ) {
1290  return 1;
1291  }
1292  static const float default_daylight = default_daylight_level();
1293  if( light_level == 0 ) {
1294  return type->vision_night;
1295  } else if( light_level >= default_daylight ) {
1296  return type->vision_day;
1297  }
1298  int range = ( light_level * type->vision_day + ( default_daylight - light_level ) *
1299  type->vision_night ) / default_daylight;
1300 
1301  return range;
1302 }

1405 Creature *monster::attack_target()
1406 {
1407  if( !has_dest() ) {
1408  return nullptr;
1409  }
1410 
1411  Creature *target = get_creature_tracker().creature_at( get_dest() );
1412  if( target == nullptr || target == this ||
1413  attitude_to( *target ) == Attitude::FRIENDLY || !sees( *target ) || target->is_hallucination() ) {
1414  return nullptr;
1415  }
1416 
1417  return target;
1418 }

1420 void monster::witness_thievery( item *it )
1421 {
1422  add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s saw the %2$s being stolen!" ), get_name(), it->tname() );
1423  std::vector<npc *> friends;
1424  for( npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
1425  if( guy.get_faction() && guy.get_faction()->mon_faction == faction.id() ) {
1426  friends.push_back( &guy );
1427  }
1428  }
1429  if( friends.empty() ) {
1430  aggro_character = true;
1431  anger = 100;
1432  return;
1433  }
1434  std::sort( friends.begin(), friends.end(), npc::theft_witness_compare );
1435  friends[0]->witness_thievery( it );
1436 }

1438 bool monster::is_fleeing( Character &u ) const
1439 {
1440  if( effect_cache[FLEEING] ) {
1441  return true;
1442  }
1443  if( anger >= 100 || morale >= 100 ) {
1444  return false;
1445  }
1446  monster_attitude att = attitude( &u );
1447  return att == MATT_FLEE || ( att == MATT_FOLLOW && rl_dist( pos(), u.pos() ) <= 4 );
1448 }
1449 
1450 Creature::Attitude monster::attitude_to( const Creature &other ) const
1451 {
1452  const monster *m = other.is_monster() ? static_cast< const monster *>( &other ) : nullptr;
1453  const Character *p = other.as_character();
1454  if( m != nullptr ) {
1455  if( m == this ) {
1456  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
1457  }
1458 
1459  mf_attitude faction_att = faction.obj().attitude( m->faction );
1460  if( ( friendly != 0 && m->friendly != 0 ) ||
1461  ( friendly == 0 && m->friendly == 0 && faction_att == MFA_FRIENDLY ) ) {
1462  // Friendly (to player) monsters are friendly to each other
1463  // Unfriendly monsters go by faction attitude
1464  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
1465  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(bugprone-branch-clone)
1466  } else if( friendly == 0 && m->friendly == 0 && faction_att == MFA_HATE ) {
1467  // Stuff that hates a specific faction will always attack that faction
1468  return Attitude::HOSTILE;
1469  } else if( ( friendly == 0 && m->friendly == 0 && faction_att == MFA_NEUTRAL ) ||
1470  morale < 0 || anger < 10 ) {
1471  // Stuff that won't attack is neutral to everything
1472  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
1473  } else {
1474  return Attitude::HOSTILE;
1475  }
1476  } else if( p != nullptr ) {
1477  switch( attitude( p ) ) {
1478  case MATT_FRIEND:
1479  return Attitude::FRIENDLY;
1480  case MATT_FPASSIVE:
1481  case MATT_FLEE:
1482  case MATT_IGNORE:
1483  case MATT_FOLLOW:
1484  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
1485  case MATT_ATTACK:
1486  return Attitude::HOSTILE;
1487  case MATT_NULL:
1488  case NUM_MONSTER_ATTITUDES:
1489  break;
1490  }
1491  }
1492  // Should not happen!, creature should be either player or monster
1493  return Attitude::NEUTRAL;
1494 }
1495 
1496 monster_attitude monster::attitude( const Character *u ) const
1497 {
1498  // override for the Personal Portal Storms Mod
1499  // if the monster is a nether portal monster and the character is an NPC then ignore
1500  if( u != nullptr && faction == monfaction_nether_player_hate && u->is_npc() &&
1501  get_option<bool>( "PORTAL_STORM_IGNORE_NPC" ) ) {
1502  // portal storm creatures ignore NPCs no matter what with this mod on
1503  return MATT_FPASSIVE;
1504  }
1505 
1506  if( friendly != 0 ) {
1507  if( has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
1508  return MATT_FPASSIVE;
1509  }
1510  if( u != nullptr ) {
1511  if( u->is_avatar() ) {
1512  return MATT_FRIEND;
1513  }
1514  if( u->is_npc() ) {
1515  // Zombies don't understand not attacking NPCs, but dogs and bots should.
1516  if( u->get_attitude() != NPCATT_KILL && !type->in_species( species_ZOMBIE ) ) {
1517  return MATT_FRIEND;
1518  }
1519  if( u->is_hallucination() ) {
1520  return MATT_IGNORE;
1521  }
1522  }
1523  }
1524  }
1525  if( effect_cache[FLEEING] ) {
1526  return MATT_FLEE;
1527  }
1528 
1529  int effective_anger = anger;
1530  int effective_morale = morale;
1531 
1532  if( u != nullptr ) {
1533  if( faction == monfaction_bee ) {
1534  if( u->has_trait( trait_BEE ) ) {
1535  return MATT_FRIEND;
1536  } else if( u->has_trait( trait_FLOWERS ) ) {
1537  effective_anger -= 10;
1538  }
1539  }
1540  auto *u_fac = u->get_faction();
1541  if( u_fac && u_fac->mon_faction && faction == u_fac->mon_faction ) {
1542  return MATT_FRIEND;
1543  }
1544 
1545  if( type->in_species( species_FUNGUS ) && ( u->has_trait( trait_THRESH_MYCUS ) ||
1546  u->has_trait( trait_MYCUS_FRIEND ) ) ) {
1547  return MATT_FRIEND;
1548  }
1549 
1550  if( effective_anger >= 10 &&
1551  type->in_species( species_MAMMAL ) && u->has_trait( trait_PHEROMONE_MAMMAL ) ) {
1552  effective_anger -= 20;
1553  }
1554 
1555  if( effective_anger >= 10 &&
1556  type->in_species( species_AMPHIBIAN ) && u->has_trait( trait_PHEROMONE_AMPHIBIAN ) ) {
1557  effective_anger -= 20;
1558  }
1559 
1560  if( ( faction == monfaction_acid_ant || faction == monfaction_ant || faction == monfaction_bee ||
1561  faction == monfaction_wasp ) && effective_anger >= 10 && u->has_trait( trait_PHEROMONE_INSECT ) ) {
1562  effective_anger -= 20;
1563  }
1564 
1565  if( u->has_trait( trait_TERRIFYING ) ) {
1566  effective_morale -= 10;
1567  }
1568 
1569  if( has_flag( mon_flag_ANIMAL ) ) {
1570  if( u->has_effect( effect_natures_commune ) ) {
1571  effective_anger -= 10;
1572  if( effective_anger < 10 ) {
1573  effective_morale += 55;
1574  }
1575  }
1576  if( u->has_trait( trait_ANIMALEMPATH ) ) {
1577  effective_anger -= 10;
1578  if( effective_anger < 10 ) {
1579  effective_morale += 55;
1580  }
1581  } else if( u->has_trait( trait_ANIMALEMPATH2 ) ) {
1582  effective_anger -= 20;
1583  if( effective_anger < 20 ) {
1584  effective_morale += 80;
1585  }
1586  } else if( u->has_trait( trait_ANIMALDISCORD ) ) {
1587  if( effective_anger >= 10 ) {
1588  effective_anger += 10;
1589  }
1590  if( effective_anger < 10 ) {
1591  effective_morale -= 5;
1592  }
1593  } else if( u->has_trait( trait_ANIMALDISCORD2 ) ) {
1594  if( effective_anger >= 20 ) {
1595  effective_anger += 20;
1596  }
1597  if( effective_anger < 20 ) {
1598  effective_morale -= 5;
1599  }
1600  }
1601  }
1602 
1603  for( const trait_id &mut : u->get_mutations() ) {
1604  const mutation_branch &branch = *mut;
1605  if( branch.ignored_by.empty() && branch.anger_relations.empty() ) {
1606  continue;
1607  }
1608  for( const species_id &spe : branch.ignored_by ) {
1609  if( type->in_species( spe ) ) {
1610  return MATT_IGNORE;
1611  }
1612  }
1613  for( const std::pair<const species_id, int> &elem : branch.anger_relations ) {
1614  if( type->in_species( elem.first ) ) {
1615  effective_anger += elem.second;
1616  }
1617  }
1618  }
1619  }
1620 
1621  if( effective_morale < 0 ) {
1622  if( effective_morale + effective_anger > 0 && get_hp() > get_hp_max() / 3 ) {
1623  return MATT_FOLLOW;
1624  }
1625  return MATT_FLEE;
1626  }
1627 
1628  if( effective_anger <= 0 ) {
1629  if( get_hp() <= 0.6 * get_hp_max() ) {
1630  return MATT_FLEE;
1631  } else {
1632  return MATT_IGNORE;
1633  }
1634  }
1635 
1636  if( effective_anger < 10 ) {
1637  return MATT_FOLLOW;
1638  }
1639 
1640  if( has_flag( mon_flag_KEEP_DISTANCE ) &&
1641  rl_dist( get_location(), get_dest() ) < type->tracking_distance ) {
1642  return MATT_FLEE;
1643  }
1644 
1645  if( u != nullptr && !aggro_character && !u->is_monster() ) {
1646  return MATT_IGNORE;
1647  }
1648 
1649  return MATT_ATTACK;
1650 }
1651 
1652 int monster::hp_percentage() const
1653 {
1654  return get_hp( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) * 100 / get_hp_max();
1655 }
1656 
1657 int monster::get_eff_per() const
1658 {
1659  return std::min( type->vision_night, type->vision_day );
1660 }
1661 
1662 void monster::process_triggers()
1663 {
1664  process_trigger( mon_trigger::STALK, [this]() {
1665  return anger > 0 && one_in( 5 ) ? 1 : 0;
1666  } );
1667 
1668  process_trigger( mon_trigger::BRIGHT_LIGHT, [this]() {
1669  int ret = 0;
1670  static const int dim_light = round( .75 * default_daylight_level() );
1671  int light = round( get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) );
1672  if( light >= dim_light ) {
1673  ret += 10;
1674  }
1675  return ret;
1676  } );
1677 
1678  process_trigger( mon_trigger::FIRE, [this]() {
1679  int ret = 0;
1680  map &here = get_map();
1681  const field_type_id fd_fire = ::fd_fire; // convert to int_id once
1682  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 3 ) ) {
1683  // note using `has_field_at` without bound checks,
1684  // as points that come from `points_in_radius` are guaranteed to be in bounds
1685  const int fire_intensity =
1686  here.has_field_at( p, false ) ? 5 * here.get_field_intensity( p, fd_fire ) : 0;
1687  ret += fire_intensity;
1688  }
1689  return ret;
1690  } );
1691 
1692  if( morale != type->morale && one_in( 4 ) &&
1693  ( ( std::abs( morale - type->morale ) > 15 ) || one_in( 2 ) ) ) {
1694  if( morale < type->morale ) {
1695  morale++;
1696  } else {
1697  morale--;
1698  }
1699  }
1700 
1701  if( anger != type->agro && one_in( 4 ) &&
1702  ( ( std::abs( anger - type->agro ) > 15 ) || one_in( 2 ) ) ) {
1703  if( anger < type->agro ) {
1704  anger++;
1705  } else {
1706  anger--;
1707  }
1708  }
1709 
1710  // If we got angry at characters have a chance at calming down
1711  if( anger == type->agro && aggro_character && !type->aggro_character && !x_in_y( anger, 100 ) ) {
1712  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "%s's character aggro reset", name() );
1713  aggro_character = false;
1714  }
1715 
1716  // Cap values at [-100, 100] to prevent perma-angry moose etc.
1717  morale = std::min( 100, std::max( -100, morale ) );
1718  anger = std::min( 100, std::max( -100, anger ) );
1719 }
1720 
1721 // This adjusts anger/morale levels given a single trigger.
1722 void monster::process_trigger( mon_trigger trig, int amount )
1723 {
1724  if( type->has_anger_trigger( trig ) ) {
1725  anger += amount;
1726  }
1727  if( type->has_fear_trigger( trig ) ) {
1728  morale -= amount;
1729  }
1730  if( type->has_placate_trigger( trig ) ) {
1731  anger -= amount;
1732  }
1733 }
1734 
1735 void monster::process_trigger( mon_trigger trig, const std::function<int()> &amount_func )
1736 {
1737  if( type->has_anger_trigger( trig ) ) {
1738  anger += amount_func();
1739  }
1740  if( type->has_fear_trigger( trig ) ) {
1741  morale -= amount_func();
1742  }
1743  if( type->has_placate_trigger( trig ) ) {
1744  anger -= amount_func();
1745  }
1746 }

1780 bool monster::is_immune_effect( const efftype_id &effect ) const
1781 {
1782  if( effect == effect_onfire ) {
1783  return is_immune_damage( damage_heat ) ||
1784  made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ||
1785  has_flag( mon_flag_FIREY );
1786  }
1787 
1788  if( effect == effect_bleed ) {
1789  return ( type->bloodType() == fd_null || type->bleed_rate == 0 );
1790  }
1791 
1792  if( effect == effect_venom_dmg ||
1793  effect == effect_venom_player1 ||
1794  effect == effect_venom_player2 ) {
1795  return ( !made_of( material_flesh ) && !made_of( material_iflesh ) ) ||
1796  type->in_species( species_NETHER ) || type->in_species( species_MIGO ) ||
1797  type->in_species( species_LEECH_PLANT );
1798  }
1799 
1800  if( effect == effect_paralyzepoison ||
1801  effect == effect_badpoison ||
1802  effect == effect_venom_weaken ||
1803  effect == effect_poison ) {
1804  return type->in_species( species_ZOMBIE ) || type->in_species( species_NETHER ) ||
1805  type->in_species( species_MIGO ) ||
1806  !made_of_any( Creature::cmat_flesh ) || type->in_species( species_LEECH_PLANT );
1807  }
1808 
1809  if( effect == effect_tpollen ) {
1810  return type->in_species( species_PLANT );
1811  }
1812 
1813  if( effect == effect_stunned ) {
1814  return has_flag( mon_flag_STUN_IMMUNE );
1815  }
1816 
1817  if( effect == effect_downed ) {
1818  if( type->bodytype == "insect" || type->bodytype == "flying insect" || type->bodytype == "spider" ||
1819  type->bodytype == "crab" ) {
1820  return x_in_y( 3, 4 );
1821  } else {
1822  return type->bodytype == "snake" || type->bodytype == "blob" || type->bodytype == "fish" ||
1823  has_flag( mon_flag_FLIES ) || has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE );
1824  }
1825  }
1826  return false;
1827 }
1828 
1829 bool monster::is_immune_damage( const damage_type_id &dt ) const
1830 {
1831  if( !dt->mon_immune_flags.empty() ) {
1832  for( const std::string &mf : dt->mon_immune_flags ) {
1833  if( has_flag( mon_flag_id( mf ) ) ) {
1834  return true;
1835  }
1836  }
1837  }
1838  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type specific immunities
1839  if( dt == damage_heat && ( made_of( material_steel ) || made_of( material_stone ) ) ) {
1840  return true;
1841  }
1842  if( dt == damage_electric && type->sp_defense == &mdefense::zapback ) {
1843  return true;
1844  }
1845 
1846  return false;
1847 }

1849 void monster::make_bleed( const effect_source &source, time_duration duration, int intensity,
1850  bool permanent, bool force, bool defferred )
1851 {
1852  if( type->bleed_rate == 0 ) {
1853  return;
1854  }
1855 
1856  duration = ( duration * type->bleed_rate ) / 100;
1857  if( type->in_species( species_ROBOT ) ) {
1858  add_effect( source, effect_dripping_mechanical_fluid, duration, bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID() );
1859  } else {
1860  add_effect( source, effect_bleed, duration, bodypart_str_id::NULL_ID(), permanent, intensity, force,
1861  defferred );
1862  }
1863 }

1874 
1875 const weakpoint *monster::absorb_hit( const weakpoint_attack &attack, const bodypart_id &,
1876  damage_instance &dam )
1877 {
1878  resistances r = resistances( *this );
1879  const weakpoint *wp = type->weakpoints.select_weakpoint( attack );
1880  wp->apply_to( r );
1881  for( damage_unit &elem : dam.damage_units ) {
1882  armor_enchantment_adjust( *this, elem );
1883  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER,
1884  "Dam Type: %s :: Dam Amt: %.1f :: Ar Pen: %.1f :: Armor Mult: %.1f",
1885  elem.type.c_str(), elem.amount, elem.res_pen, elem.res_mult );
1886  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER,
1887  "Weakpoint: %s :: Armor Mult: %.1f :: Armor Penalty: %.1f :: Resist: %.1f",
1888  wp->id, wp->armor_mult.count( elem.type ) > 0 ? wp->armor_mult.at( elem.type ) : 0.f,
1889  wp->armor_penalty.count( elem.type ) > 0 ? wp->armor_penalty.at( elem.type ) : 0.f,
1890  r.get_effective_resist( elem ) );
1891  elem.amount -= std::min( r.get_effective_resist( elem ) +
1892  get_worn_armor_val( elem.type ), elem.amount );
1893  }
1894  wp->apply_to( dam, attack.is_crit );
1895  return wp;
1896 }

1902 
1903 bool monster::melee_attack( Creature &target, float accuracy )
1904 {
1905  // Note: currently this method must consume move even if attack hasn't actually happen
1906  // otherwise infinite loop will happen
1907  mod_moves( -type->attack_cost );
1908  if( /*This happens sometimes*/ this == &target || !is_adjacent( &target, true ) ) {
1909  return false;
1910  }
1911  if( !sees( target ) && !target.is_hallucination() ) {
1912  debugmsg( "Z-Level view violation: %s tried to attack %s.", disp_name(), target.disp_name() );
1913  return false;
1914  }
1915 
1916  const int monster_hit_roll = melee::melee_hit_range( accuracy );
1917  int hitspread = target.deal_melee_attack( this, monster_hit_roll );
1918  if( type->melee_dice == 0 ) {
1919  // We don't hit, so just return
1920  return true;
1921  }
1922 
1923  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1924  if( target.is_avatar() ||
1925  ( target.is_npc() && player_character.attitude_to( target ) == Attitude::FRIENDLY ) ) {
1926  // Make us a valid target for a few turns
1927  add_effect( effect_hit_by_player, 3_turns );
1928  }
1929 
1930  if( has_flag( mon_flag_HIT_AND_RUN ) ) {
1931  add_effect( effect_run, 4_turns );
1932  }
1933 
1934  const bool u_see_me = player_character.sees( *this );
1935  const bool u_see_my_spot = player_character.sees( this->pos() );
1936  const bool u_see_target = player_character.sees( target );
1937 
1938  damage_instance damage = !is_hallucination() ? type->melee_damage : damage_instance();
1939  if( !is_hallucination() && type->melee_dice > 0 ) {
1940  damage.add_damage( damage_bash, dice( type->melee_dice, type->melee_sides ) );
1941  }
1942 
1943  dealt_damage_instance dealt_dam;
1944 
1945  if( hitspread >= 0 ) {
1946  target.deal_melee_hit( this, hitspread, false, damage, dealt_dam );
1947  }
1948 
1949  const int total_dealt = dealt_dam.total_damage();
1950  if( hitspread < 0 ) {
1951  bool monster_missed = monster_hit_roll < 0.0;
1952  // Miss
1953  if( u_see_my_spot && !target.in_sleep_state() ) {
1954  if( target.is_avatar() ) {
1955  if( monster_missed ) {
1956  add_msg( _( "%s misses you." ), u_see_me ? disp_name( false, true ) : _( "Something" ) );
1957  } else {
1958  add_msg( _( "You dodge %s." ), u_see_me ? disp_name() : _( "something" ) );
1959  }
1960  } else if( target.is_npc() ) {
1961  if( monster_missed ) {
1962  add_msg( _( "%1$s misses %2$s!" ),
1963  u_see_me ? disp_name( false, true ) : _( "Something" ), target.disp_name() );
1964  } else {
1965  add_msg( _( "%1$s dodges %2$s attack." ),
1966  target.disp_name(), u_see_me ? name() : _( "something" ) );
1967  }
1968  }
1969  } else if( target.is_avatar() ) {
1970  add_msg( _( "You dodge an attack from an unseen source." ) );
1971  }
1972  } else if( is_hallucination() || total_dealt > 0 ) {
1973  // Hallucinations always produce messages but never actually deal damage
1974  if( u_see_my_spot ) {
1975  if( target.is_avatar() ) {
1976  sfx::play_variant_sound( "melee_attack", "monster_melee_hit",
1977  sfx::get_heard_volume( target.pos() ) );
1978  // don't make a pain yelp if our limb is a bionic
1979  if( !dealt_dam.bp_hit->has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_LIMB ) ) {
1980  sfx::do_player_death_hurt( dynamic_cast<Character &>( target ), false );
1981  }
1982  //~ 1$s is attacker name, 2$s is bodypart name in accusative.
1983  add_msg( m_bad, _( "%1$s hits your %2$s." ), u_see_me ? disp_name( false, true ) : _( "Something" ),
1984  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ) );
1985  } else if( target.is_npc() ) {
1986  if( has_effect( effect_ridden ) && has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
1987  pos() == player_character.pos() ) {
1988  //~ %1$s: name of your mount, %2$s: target NPC name, %3$d: damage value
1989  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your %1$s hits %2$s for %3$d damage!" ), name(), target.disp_name(),
1990  total_dealt );
1991  } else {
1992  //~ %1$s: attacker name, %2$s: target NPC name, %3$s: bodypart name in accusative
1993  add_msg( _( "%1$s hits %2$s %3$s." ), u_see_me ? disp_name( false, true ) : _( "Something" ),
1994  target.disp_name( true ),
1995  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ) );
1996  }
1997  } else {
1998  if( has_effect( effect_ridden ) && has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
1999  pos() == player_character.pos() ) {
2000  //~ %1$s: name of your mount, %2$s: target creature name, %3$d: damage value
2001  add_msg( m_good, _( "Your %1$s hits %2$s for %3$d damage!" ), get_name(), target.disp_name(),
2002  total_dealt );
2003  }
2004  if( get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_ATTACK_MONSTER" ) ) {
2005  if( !u_see_me && u_see_target ) {
2006  add_msg( _( "Something hits the %1$s!" ), target.disp_name() );
2007  } else if( !u_see_target ) {
2008  add_msg( _( "The %1$s hits something!" ), name() );
2009  } else {
2010  //~ %1$s: attacker name, %2$s: target creature name
2011  add_msg( _( "The %1$s hits %2$s!" ), name(), target.disp_name() );
2012  }
2013  }
2014  }
2015  } else if( target.is_avatar() ) {
2016  //~ %s is bodypart name in accusative.
2017  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Something hits your %s." ),
2018  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ) );
2019  }
2020  } else {
2021  // No damage dealt
2022  if( u_see_my_spot ) {
2023  if( target.is_avatar() ) {
2024  //~ 1$s is attacker name, 2$s is bodypart name in accusative, 3$s is armor name
2025  add_msg( _( "%1$s hits your %2$s, but your %3$s protects you." ), u_see_me ? disp_name( false,
2026  true ) : _( "Something" ),
2027  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ), target.skin_name() );
2028  } else if( target.is_npc() ) {
2029  //~ $1s is monster name, %2$s is that monster target name,
2030  //~ $3s is target bodypart name in accusative, $4s is the monster target name,
2031  //~ 5$s is target armor name.
2032  add_msg( _( "%1$s hits %2$s %3$s but is stopped by %4$s %5$s." ), u_see_me ? disp_name( false,
2033  true ) : _( "Something" ),
2034  target.disp_name( true ),
2035  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ),
2036  target.disp_name( true ),
2037  target.skin_name() );
2038  } else if( get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_ATTACK_MONSTER" ) ) {
2039  //~ $1s is monster name, %2$s is that monster target name,
2040  //~ $3s is target armor name.
2041  add_msg( _( "%1$s hits %2$s but is stopped by its %3$s." ),
2042  u_see_me ? disp_name( false, true ) : _( "Something" ),
2043  target.disp_name(),
2044  target.skin_name() );
2045  }
2046  } else if( target.is_avatar() ) {
2047  //~ 1$s is bodypart name in accusative, 2$s is armor name.
2048  add_msg( _( "Something hits your %1$s, but your %2$s protects you." ),
2049  body_part_name_accusative( dealt_dam.bp_hit ), target.skin_name() );
2050  }
2051  }
2052 
2053  target.check_dead_state();
2054 
2055  if( is_hallucination() ) {
2056  if( one_in( 7 ) ) {
2057  die( nullptr );
2058  }
2059  return true;
2060  }
2061 
2062  if( total_dealt <= 0 ) {
2063  return true;
2064  }
2065 
2066  // Add any on damage effects
2067  for( const mon_effect_data &eff : type->atk_effs ) {
2068  if( x_in_y( eff.chance, 100 ) ) {
2069  const bodypart_id affected_bp = eff.affect_hit_bp ? dealt_dam.bp_hit : eff.bp.id();
2070  target.add_effect( eff.id, time_duration::from_turns( rng( eff.duration.first,
2071  eff.duration.second ) ), affected_bp, eff.permanent, rng( eff.intensity.first,
2072  eff.intensity.second ) );
2073  target.add_msg_if_player( m_mixed, eff.message, name() );
2074  }
2075  }
2076 
2077  const int stab_cut = dealt_dam.type_damage( damage_cut ) + dealt_dam.type_damage( damage_stab );
2078 
2079  if( stab_cut > 0 && has_flag( mon_flag_VENOM ) ) {
2080  target.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You're envenomed!" ) );
2081  target.add_effect( effect_poison, 3_minutes );
2082  }
2083 
2084  if( stab_cut > 0 && has_flag( mon_flag_BADVENOM ) ) {
2085  target.add_msg_if_player( m_bad,
2086  _( "You feel venom flood your body, wracking you with pain" ) );
2087  target.add_effect( effect_badpoison, 4_minutes );
2088  }
2089 
2090  if( stab_cut > 0 && has_flag( mon_flag_PARALYZEVENOM ) ) {
2091  target.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "You feel venom enter your body!" ) );
2092  target.add_effect( effect_paralyzepoison, 10_minutes );
2093  }
2094  return true;
2095 }

2097 void monster::deal_projectile_attack( Creature *source, dealt_projectile_attack &attack,
2098  bool print_messages, const weakpoint_attack &wp_attack )
2099 {
2100  const projectile &proj = attack.proj;
2101  double &missed_by = attack.missed_by; // We can change this here
2102  const auto &effects = proj.proj_effects;
2103 
2104  // Whip has a chance to scare wildlife even if it misses
2105  if( effects.count( "WHIP" ) && type->in_category( "WILDLIFE" ) && one_in( 3 ) ) {
2106  add_effect( effect_run, rng( 3_turns, 5_turns ) );
2107  }
2108 
2109  if( missed_by > 1.0 ) {
2110  // Total miss
2111  return;
2112  }
2113 
2114  // if it's a headshot with no head, make it not a headshot
2115  if( missed_by < accuracy_headshot && has_flag( mon_flag_NOHEAD ) ) {
2116  missed_by = accuracy_headshot;
2117  }
2118 
2119  Creature::deal_projectile_attack( source, attack, print_messages, wp_attack );
2120 
2121  if( !is_hallucination() && attack.hit_critter == this ) {
2122  // Maybe TODO: Get difficulty from projectile speed/size/missed_by
2123  on_hit( source, bodypart_id( "torso" ), INT_MIN, &attack );
2124  }
2125 }

2127 void monster::deal_damage_handle_type( const effect_source &source, const damage_unit &du,
2128  bodypart_id bp, int &damage, int &pain )
2129 {
2130  const int adjusted_damage = du.amount * du.damage_multiplier * du.unconditional_damage_mult;
2131  if( is_immune_damage( du.type ) ) {
2132  return; // immunity
2133  }
2134  // FIXME: Hardcoded damage type effects (bash, bullet)
2135  if( du.type == damage_bash ) {
2136  if( has_flag( mon_flag_PLASTIC ) ) {
2137  damage += du.amount / rng( 2, 4 ); // lessened effect
2138  pain += du.amount / 4;
2139  return;
2140  }
2141  }
2142  if( du.type == damage_bullet || du.type->edged ) {
2143  make_bleed( source, 1_minutes * rng( 0, adjusted_damage ) );
2144  }
2145 
2146  Creature::deal_damage_handle_type( source, du, bp, damage, pain );
2147 }

2149 int monster::heal( const int delta_hp, bool overheal )
2150 {
2151  const int maxhp = type->hp;
2152  if( delta_hp <= 0 || ( hp >= maxhp && !overheal ) ) {
2153  return 0;
2154  }
2155 
2156  const int old_hp = hp;
2157  hp += delta_hp;
2158  if( hp > maxhp && !overheal ) {
2159  hp = maxhp;
2160  }
2161  return hp - old_hp;
2162 }

2169 void monster::apply_damage( Creature *source, bodypart_id /*bp*/, int dam,
2170  const bool /*bypass_med*/ )
2171 {
2172  if( is_dead_state() ) {
2173  return;
2174  }
2175  // Ensure we can try to get at what hit us.
2176  reset_pathfinding_cd();
2177  hp -= dam;
2178  if( hp < 1 ) {
2179  set_killer( source );
2180  } else if( dam > 0 ) {
2181  process_trigger( mon_trigger::HURT, 1 + static_cast<int>( dam / 3 ) );
2182  // Get angry at characters if hurt by one
2183  if( source != nullptr && !aggro_character && !source->is_monster() && !source->is_fake() ) {
2184  aggro_character = true;
2185  }
2186  }
2187 }

2204 
2205 bool monster::move_effects( bool )
2206 {
2207  // This function is relatively expensive, we want that cached
2208  // IMPORTANT: If adding any new effects here, make SURE to
2209  // add them to hardcoded_movement_impairing in effect.cpp
2210  if( !effect_cache[MOVEMENT_IMPAIRED] ) {
2211  return true;
2212  }
2213 
2214  map &here = get_map();
2215  bool u_see_me = get_player_view().sees( *this );
2216  if( has_effect( effect_tied ) ) {
2217  // friendly pet, will stay tied down and obey.
2218  if( friendly == -1 ) {
2219  return false;
2220  }
2221  // non-friendly monster will struggle to get free occasionally.
2222  // some monsters can't be tangled up with a net/bolas/lasso etc.
2223  bool immediate_break = type->in_species( species_FISH ) || type->in_species( species_MOLLUSK ) ||
2224  type->in_species( species_ROBOT ) || type->bodytype == "snake" || type->bodytype == "blob";
2225  if( !immediate_break && rng( 0, 900 ) > type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides * 1.5 ) {
2226  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2227  add_msg( _( "The %s struggles to break free of its bonds." ), name() );
2228  }
2229  } else if( immediate_break ) {
2230  remove_effect( effect_tied );
2231  if( tied_item ) {
2232  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2233  add_msg( _( "The %s easily slips out of its bonds." ), name() );
2234  }
2235  here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), *tied_item );
2236  tied_item.reset();
2237  }
2238  } else {
2239  if( tied_item ) {
2240  const bool broken = rng( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, std::min( 10000,
2241  type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides * 250 ) ) > 800;
2242  if( !broken ) {
2243  here.add_item_or_charges( pos(), *tied_item );
2244  }
2245  tied_item.reset();
2246  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2247  if( broken ) {
2248  add_msg( _( "The %s snaps the bindings holding it down." ), name() );
2249  } else {
2250  add_msg( _( "The %s breaks free of the bindings holding it down." ), name() );
2251  }
2252  }
2253  }
2254  remove_effect( effect_tied );
2255  }
2256  return false;
2257  }
2258  if( has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
2259  if( rng( 0, 40 ) > type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides * 1.5 ) {
2260  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2261  add_msg( _( "The %s struggles to stand." ), name() );
2262  }
2263  } else {
2264  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2265  add_msg( _( "The %s climbs to its feet!" ), name() );
2266  }
2267  remove_effect( effect_downed );
2268  }
2269  return false;
2270  }
2271  if( has_effect( effect_webbed ) ) {
2272  if( x_in_y( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, 6 * get_effect_int( effect_webbed ) ) ) {
2273  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2274  add_msg( _( "The %s breaks free of the webs!" ), name() );
2275  }
2276  remove_effect( effect_webbed );
2277  }
2278  return false;
2279  }
2280  if( has_effect( effect_lightsnare ) ) {
2281  if( x_in_y( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, 12 ) ) {
2282  remove_effect( effect_lightsnare );
2283  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2284  add_msg( _( "The %s escapes the light snare!" ), name() );
2285  }
2286  }
2287  return false;
2288  }
2289  if( has_effect( effect_heavysnare ) ) {
2290  if( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides >= 7 ) {
2291  if( x_in_y( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, 32 ) ) {
2292  remove_effect( effect_heavysnare );
2293  here.spawn_item( pos(), "rope_6" );
2294  here.spawn_item( pos(), "snare_trigger" );
2295  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2296  add_msg( _( "The %s escapes the heavy snare!" ), name() );
2297  }
2298  }
2299  }
2300  return false;
2301  }
2302  if( has_effect( effect_beartrap ) ) {
2303  if( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides >= 18 ) {
2304  if( x_in_y( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, 200 ) ) {
2305  remove_effect( effect_beartrap );
2306  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2307  add_msg( _( "The %s escapes the bear trap!" ), name() );
2308  }
2309  }
2310  }
2311  return false;
2312  }
2313  if( has_effect( effect_crushed ) ) {
2314  if( x_in_y( type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides, 100 ) ) {
2315  remove_effect( effect_crushed );
2316  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2317  add_msg( _( "The %s frees itself from the rubble!" ), name() );
2318  }
2319  }
2320  return false;
2321  }
2322  if( has_effect( effect_worked_on ) ) {
2323  return false;
2324  }
2325 
2326  // If we ever get more effects that force movement on success this will need to be reworked to
2327  // only trigger success effects if /all/ rolls succeed
2328  if( has_effect( effect_in_pit ) ) {
2329  if( rng( 0, 40 ) > type->melee_dice * type->melee_sides ) {
2330  return false;
2331  } else {
2332  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2333  add_msg( _( "The %s escapes the pit!" ), name() );
2334  }
2335  remove_effect( effect_in_pit );
2336  }
2337  }
2338  if( has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2339  // Pretty hacky, but monsters have no stats
2340  map &here = get_map();
2341  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
2342  const tripoint_range<tripoint> &surrounding = here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1, 0 );
2343  for( const effect &grab : get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2344  // Is our grabber around?
2345  monster *grabber = nullptr;
2346  for( const tripoint loc : surrounding ) {
2347  monster *mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( loc );
2348  if( mon && mon->has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB_FILTER ) ) {
2349  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MATTACK, "Grabber %s found", mon->name() );
2350  grabber = mon;
2351  break;
2352  }
2353  }
2354 
2355  if( grabber == nullptr ) {
2356  remove_effect( grab.get_id() );
2357  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MATTACK, "Orphan grab found and removed" );
2358  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2359  add_msg( _( "The %s is no longer grabbed!" ), name() );
2360  }
2361  continue;
2362  }
2363  int monster = type->melee_skill + type->melee_damage.total_damage();
2364  int grab_str = get_effect_int( grab.get_id() );
2365  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "%s attempting to break grab %s, success %d in intensity %d",
2366  get_name(), grab.get_id().c_str(), monster, grabber );
2367  if( !x_in_y( monster, grab_str ) ) {
2368  return false;
2369  } else {
2370  if( u_see_me && get_option<bool>( "LOG_MONSTER_MOVE_EFFECTS" ) ) {
2371  add_msg( _( "The %s breaks free from the %s's grab!" ), name(), grabber->name() );
2372  }
2373  remove_effect( grab.get_id() );
2374  }
2375  }
2376  }
2377  return true;
2378 }

2435 float monster::stability_roll() const
2436 {
2437  int size_bonus = 0;
2438  switch( type->size ) {
2439  case creature_size::tiny:
2440  size_bonus -= 7;
2441  break;
2442  case creature_size::small:
2443  size_bonus -= 3;
2444  break;
2445  case creature_size::large:
2446  size_bonus += 5;
2447  break;
2448  case creature_size::huge:
2449  size_bonus += 10;
2450  break;
2451  case creature_size::medium:
2452  break; // keep default
2453  case creature_size::num_sizes:
2454  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid Creature size class." );
2455  break;
2456  }
2457 
2458  int stability = dice( type->melee_sides, type->melee_dice ) + size_bonus;
2459  if( has_effect( effect_stunned ) ) {
2460  stability -= rng( 1, 5 );
2461  }
2462  return stability;
2463 }

2465 float monster::get_dodge() const
2466 {
2467  if( has_effect( effect_downed ) ) {
2468  return 0.0f;
2469  }
2470 
2471  float ret = Creature::get_dodge();
2472  if( has_effect( effect_lightsnare ) || has_effect( effect_heavysnare ) ||
2473  has_effect( effect_beartrap ) || has_effect( effect_tied ) ) {
2474  ret /= 2;
2475  }
2476 
2477  if( has_effect( effect_bouldering ) ) {
2478  ret /= 4;
2479  }
2480 
2481  return ret;
2482 }

2524 float monster::fall_damage_mod() const
2525 {
2526  if( flies() ) {
2527  return 0.0f;
2528  }
2529 
2530  switch( type->size ) {
2531  case creature_size::tiny:
2532  return 0.2f;
2533  case creature_size::small:
2534  return 0.6f;
2535  case creature_size::medium:
2536  return 1.0f;
2537  case creature_size::large:
2538  return 1.4f;
2539  case creature_size::huge:
2540  return 2.0f;
2541  case creature_size::num_sizes:
2542  debugmsg( "ERROR: Invalid Creature size class." );
2543  return 0.0f;
2544  }
2545 
2546  return 0.0f;
2547 }

2549 int monster::impact( const int force, const tripoint &p )
2550 {
2551  if( force <= 0 ) {
2552  return force;
2553  }
2554 
2555  const float mod = fall_damage_mod();
2556  int total_dealt = 0;
2557  if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_SHARP, p ) ) {
2558  const int cut_damage = std::max( 0.0f, 10 * mod - get_armor_type( damage_cut,
2559  bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) );
2560  apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), cut_damage );
2561  total_dealt += 10 * mod;
2562  }
2563 
2564  const int bash_damage = std::max( 0.0f, force * mod - get_armor_type( damage_bash,
2565  bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) );
2566  apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), bash_damage );
2567  total_dealt += force * mod;
2568 
2569  add_effect( effect_downed, time_duration::from_turns( rng( 0, mod * 3 + 1 ) ) );
2570 
2571  return total_dealt;
2572 }
