2627 void monster::process_turn()
2628 {
2629  map &here = get_map();
2630  if( !is_hallucination() ) {
2631  for( const std::pair<const emit_id, time_duration> &e : type->emit_fields ) {
2632  if( !calendar::once_every( e.second ) ) {
2633  continue;
2634  }
2635  const emit_id emid = e.first;
2636  if( emid == emit_emit_shock_cloud ) {
2637  if( has_effect( effect_emp ) ) {
2638  continue; // don't emit electricity while EMPed
2639  } else if( has_effect( effect_supercharged ) ) {
2640  here.emit_field( pos(), emit_emit_shock_cloud_big );
2641  continue;
2642  }
2643  }
2644  here.emit_field( pos(), emid );
2645  }
2646  }
2647 
2648  // Special attack cooldowns are updated here.
2649  // Loop through the monster's special attacks, same as monster::move.
2650  for( const auto &sp_type : type->special_attacks ) {
2651  const std::string &special_name = sp_type.first;
2652  const auto local_iter = special_attacks.find( special_name );
2653  if( local_iter == special_attacks.end() ) {
2654  continue;
2655  }
2656  mon_special_attack &local_attack_data = local_iter->second;
2657  if( !local_attack_data.enabled ) {
2658  continue;
2659  }
2660 
2661  if( local_attack_data.cooldown > 0 ) {
2662  local_attack_data.cooldown--;
2663  }
2664  }
2665  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
2666  // Persist grabs as long as there's an adjacent target.
2667  if( has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB_FILTER ) ) {
2668  bool remove = true;
2669  for( const tripoint &dest : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1, 0 ) ) {
2670  const Creature *const you = creatures.creature_at<Creature>( dest );
2671  if( you && you->has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2672  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MATTACK, "Grabbed creature %s found, persisting grab.",
2673  you->get_name() );
2674  remove = false;
2675  }
2676  }
2677  if( remove ) {
2678  for( const effect &eff : get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB_FILTER ) ) {
2679  const efftype_id effid = eff.get_id();
2680  remove_effect( effid );
2681  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MATTACK, "Grab filter effect %s removed.", effid.c_str() );
2682  }
2683  }
2684  }
2685  // We update electrical fields here since they act every turn.
2686  if( has_flag( mon_flag_ELECTRIC_FIELD ) && !is_hallucination() ) {
2687  if( has_effect( effect_emp ) ) {
2688  if( calendar::once_every( 10_turns ) ) {
2689  sounds::sound( pos(), 5, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "hummmmm." ), false, "humming", "electric" );
2690  }
2691  } else {
2692  weather_manager &weather = get_weather();
2693  for( const tripoint &zap : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1 ) ) {
2694  const map_stack items = here.i_at( zap );
2695  for( const item &item : items ) {
2696  if( item.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && item.flammable() ) { // start a fire!
2697  here.add_field( zap, fd_fire, 2, 1_minutes );
2698  sounds::sound( pos(), 30, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "fwoosh!" ), false, "fire", "ignition" );
2699  break;
2700  }
2701  }
2702  if( zap != pos() ) {
2703  explosion_handler::emp_blast( zap ); // Fries electronics due to the intensity of the field
2704  }
2705  const ter_id t = here.ter( zap );
2706  if( t == ter_t_gas_pump || t == ter_t_gas_pump_a ) {
2707  if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
2708  explosion_handler::explosion( this, pos(), 40, 0.8, true );
2709  add_msg_if_player_sees( zap, m_warning, _( "The %s explodes in a fiery inferno!" ),
2710  here.tername( zap ) );
2711  } else {
2712  add_msg_if_player_sees( zap, m_warning, _( "Lightning from %1$s engulfs the %2$s!" ),
2713  name(), here.tername( zap ) );
2714  here.add_field( zap, fd_fire, 1, 2_turns );
2715  }
2716  }
2717  }
2718  if( weather.lightning_active && !has_effect( effect_supercharged ) &&
2719  here.is_outside( pos() ) ) {
2720  weather.lightning_active = false; // only one supercharge per strike
2721  sounds::sound( pos(), 300, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "BOOOOOOOM!!!" ), false, "environment",
2722  "thunder_near" );
2723  sounds::sound( pos(), 20, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "vrrrRRRUUMMMMMMMM!" ), false, "explosion",
2724  "default" );
2725  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
2726  if( player_character.sees( pos() ) ) {
2727  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Lightning strikes the %s!" ), name() );
2728  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your vision goes white!" ) );
2729  player_character.add_effect( effect_blind, rng( 1_minutes, 2_minutes ) );
2730  }
2731  add_effect( effect_supercharged, 12_hours );
2732  } else if( has_effect( effect_supercharged ) && calendar::once_every( 5_turns ) ) {
2733  sounds::sound( pos(), 20, sounds::sound_t::combat, _( "VMMMMMMMMM!" ), false, "humming",
2734  "electric" );
2735  }
2736  }
2737  }
2738 
2739  Creature::process_turn();
2740 }
2741 
2742 void monster::die( Creature *nkiller )
2743 {
2744  if( dead ) {
2745  // We are already dead, don't die again, note that monster::dead is
2746  // *only* set to true in this function!
2747  return;
2748  }
2749  // We were carrying a creature, deposit the rider
2750  if( has_effect( effect_ridden ) && mounted_player ) {
2751  mounted_player->forced_dismount();
2752  }
2753  g->set_critter_died();
2754  dead = true;
2755  set_killer( nkiller );
2756  if( get_killer() != nullptr ) {
2757  Character *ch = get_killer()->as_character();
2758  if( ch == nullptr && get_killer()->get_summoner() != nullptr ) {
2759  ch = get_killer()->get_summoner()->as_character();
2760  }
2761  if( !is_hallucination() && ch != nullptr ) {
2762  cata::event e = cata::event::make<event_type::character_kills_monster>( ch->getID(), type->id,
2763  compute_kill_xp( type->id ) );
2764  get_event_bus().send_with_talker( ch, this, e );
2765  if( ch->is_avatar() && ch->has_trait( trait_KILLER ) ) {
2766  if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
2767  const translation snip = SNIPPET.random_from_category( "killer_on_kill" ).value_or( translation() );
2768  ch->add_msg_if_player( m_good, "%s", snip );
2769  }
2770  ch->add_morale( MORALE_KILLER_HAS_KILLED, 5, 10, 6_hours, 4_hours );
2771  ch->rem_morale( MORALE_KILLER_NEED_TO_KILL );
2772  }
2773  }
2774  }
2775  map &here = get_map();
2776  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
2777  if( has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB_FILTER ) ) {
2778  // Need to filter out which limb we were grabbing before death
2779  for( const tripoint &player_pos : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 1, 0 ) ) {
2780  Creature *you = creatures.creature_at( player_pos );
2781  if( !you || !you->has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2782  continue;
2783  }
2784  // ...but if there are no grabbers around we can just skip to the end
2785  bool grabbed = false;
2786  for( const tripoint &mon_pos : here.points_in_radius( player_pos, 1, 0 ) ) {
2787  const monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( mon_pos );
2788  // No persisting our grabs from beyond the grave, but we also don't get to remove the effect early
2789  if( mon && mon->has_effect_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB_FILTER ) && mon != this ) {
2790  grabbed = true;
2791  break;
2792  }
2793  }
2794  if( !grabbed ) {
2795  you->add_msg_player_or_npc( m_good, _( "The last enemy holding you collapses!" ),
2796  _( "The last enemy holding <npcname> collapses!" ) );
2797  // A loop for safety
2798  for( const effect &grab : you->get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2799  you->remove_effect( grab.get_id() );
2800  }
2801  continue;
2802  }
2803  // Iterate through all your grabs to figure out which one this critter held
2804  for( const effect &grab : you->get_effects_with_flag( json_flag_GRAB ) ) {
2805  if( is_grabbing( grab.get_bp().id() ) ) {
2806  const effect_type effid = *grab.get_effect_type();
2807  you->remove_effect( effid.id, grab.get_bp() );
2808  }
2809  }
2810  }
2811  }
2812 
2813  // If we're a queen, make nearby groups of our type start to die out
2814  if( !is_hallucination() && has_flag( mon_flag_QUEEN ) ) {
2815  // The submap coordinates of this monster, monster groups coordinates are
2816  // submap coordinates.
2817  const tripoint abssub = ms_to_sm_copy( here.getabs( pos() ) );
2818  // Do it for overmap above/below too
2819  for( const tripoint &p : points_in_radius( abssub, HALF_MAPSIZE, 1 ) ) {
2820  // TODO: fix point types
2821  for( mongroup *&mgp : overmap_buffer.groups_at( tripoint_abs_sm( p ) ) ) {
2822  if( MonsterGroupManager::IsMonsterInGroup( mgp->type, type->id ) ) {
2823  mgp->dying = true;
2824  }
2825  }
2826  }
2827  }
2828  mission::on_creature_death( *this );
2829 
2830  // Hallucinations always just disappear
2831  if( is_hallucination() ) {
2832  mdeath::disappear( *this );
2833  return;
2834  }
2835 
2836  add_msg_if_player_sees( *this, m_good, type->mdeath_effect.death_message.translated(), name() );
2837 
2838  if( type->mdeath_effect.has_effect ) {
2839  //Not a hallucination, go process the death effects.
2840  spell death_spell = type->mdeath_effect.sp.get_spell( *this );
2841  if( killer != nullptr && !type->mdeath_effect.sp.self &&
2842  death_spell.is_target_in_range( *this, killer->pos() ) ) {
2843  death_spell.cast_all_effects( *this, killer->pos() );
2844  } else if( type->mdeath_effect.sp.self ) {
2845  death_spell.cast_all_effects( *this, pos() );
2846  }
2847  }
2848 
2849  if( type->mdeath_effect.eoc.has_value() ) {
2850  //Not a hallucination, go process the death effects.
2851  if( type->mdeath_effect.eoc.value().is_valid() ) {
2852  dialogue d( get_talker_for( *this ), nullptr );
2853  type->mdeath_effect.eoc.value()->activate( d );
2854  } else {
2855  debugmsg( "eoc id %s is not valid", type->mdeath_effect.eoc.value().str() );
2856  }
2857  }
2858 
2859  // scale overkill damage by enchantments
2860  if( nkiller && ( nkiller->is_npc() || nkiller->is_avatar() ) ) {
2861  int current_hp = get_hp();
2862  current_hp = nkiller->as_character()->enchantment_cache->modify_value(
2863  enchant_vals::mod::OVERKILL_DAMAGE, current_hp );
2864  set_hp( current_hp );
2865  }
2866 
2867  item_location corpse;
2868  // drop a corpse, or not - this needs to happen after the spell, for e.g. revivification effects
2869  switch( type->mdeath_effect.corpse_type ) {
2870  case mdeath_type::NORMAL:
2871  corpse = mdeath::normal( *this );
2872  break;
2873  case mdeath_type::BROKEN:
2874  mdeath::broken( *this );
2875  break;
2876  case mdeath_type::SPLATTER:
2877  corpse = mdeath::splatter( *this );
2878  break;
2879  default:
2880  break;
2881  }
2882 
2883  if( death_drops ) {
2884  // Drop items stored in optionals
2885  move_special_item_to_inv( tack_item );
2886  move_special_item_to_inv( armor_item );
2887  move_special_item_to_inv( storage_item );
2888  move_special_item_to_inv( tied_item );
2889 
2890  if( has_effect( effect_heavysnare ) ) {
2891  add_item( item( "rope_6", calendar::turn_zero ) );
2892  add_item( item( "snare_trigger", calendar::turn_zero ) );
2893  }
2894  }
2895 
2896  if( death_drops && !no_extra_death_drops ) {
2897  drop_items_on_death( corpse.get_item() );
2898  spawn_dissectables_on_death( corpse.get_item() );
2899  }
2900  if( death_drops && !is_hallucination() ) {
2901  for( const item &it : inv ) {
2902  if( it.has_var( "DESTROY_ITEM_ON_MON_DEATH" ) ) {
2903  continue;
2904  }
2905  if( corpse ) {
2906  corpse->force_insert_item( it, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
2907  } else {
2908  get_map().add_item_or_charges( pos(), it );
2909  }
2910  }
2911  for( const item &it : dissectable_inv ) {
2912  if( corpse ) {
2913  corpse->put_in( it, pocket_type::CORPSE );
2914  } else {
2915  get_map().add_item( pos(), it );
2916  }
2917  }
2918  }
2919  if( corpse ) {
2920  corpse->process( get_map(), nullptr, corpse.position() );
2921  corpse.make_active();
2922  }
2923 
2924  // Adjust anger/morale of nearby monsters, if they have the appropriate trigger and are friendly
2925  // Keep filtering on the dying monsters' triggers to preserve current functionality
2926  bool trigger = type->has_anger_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED ) ||
2927  type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED ) ||
2928  type->has_placate_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED );
2929 
2930  if( trigger ) {
2931  int light = g->light_level( posz() );
2932  map &here = get_map();
2933  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
2934  // Do we actually care about this faction?
2935  if( critter.faction->attitude( faction ) != MFA_FRIENDLY ) {
2936  continue;
2937  }
2938 
2939  if( here.sees( critter.pos(), pos(), light ) ) {
2940  // Anger trumps fear trumps ennui
2941  if( critter.type->has_anger_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED ) ) {
2942  critter.anger += 15;
2943  if( nkiller != nullptr && !nkiller->is_monster() && !nkiller->is_fake() ) {
2944  // A character killed our friend
2945  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "%s's character aggro triggered by killing a friendly %s",
2946  critter.name(), name() );
2947  critter.aggro_character = true;
2948  }
2949  } else if( critter.type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED ) ) {
2950  critter.morale -= 15;
2951  } else if( critter.type->has_placate_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_DIED ) ) {
2952  critter.anger -= 15;
2953  }
2954  }
2955  }
2956  }
2957 }

2959 units::energy monster::use_mech_power( units::energy amt )
2960 {
2961  if( is_hallucination() || !has_flag( mon_flag_RIDEABLE_MECH ) || !battery_item ) {
2962  return 0_kJ;
2963  }
2964  const int max_drain = battery_item->ammo_remaining();
2965  const int consumption = std::min( static_cast<int>( units::to_kilojoule( amt ) ), max_drain );
2966  battery_item->ammo_consume( consumption, pos(), nullptr );
2967  return units::from_kilojoule( static_cast<std::int64_t>( consumption ) );
2968 }

2975 bool monster::check_mech_powered() const
2976 {

2978  return false;
2979  }
2980  if( battery_item->ammo_remaining() <= 0 ) {
2981  return false;
2982  }
2983  const itype &type = *battery_item->type;
2984  if( battery_item->ammo_remaining() <= type.magazine->capacity / 10 && one_in( 10 ) ) {
2985  add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s emits a beeping noise as its batteries start to get low." ),
2986  get_name() );
2987  }
2988  return true;

3016 void monster::drop_items_on_death( item *corpse )
3017 {
3018  if( is_hallucination() ) {
3019  return;
3020  }
3021  if( type->death_drops.is_empty() ) {
3022  return;
3023  }
3024 
3025  std::vector<item> new_items = item_group::items_from( type->death_drops,
3026  calendar::start_of_cataclysm,
3027  spawn_flags::use_spawn_rate );
3028 
3029  for( item &e : new_items ) {
3030  e.randomize_rot();
3031  }
3032 
3033  // for non corpses this is much simpler
3034  if( !corpse ) {
3035  for( item &it : new_items ) {
3036  get_map().add_item_or_charges( pos(), it );
3037  }
3038  return;
3039  }
3040 
3041  // first put "on" things that are wearable
3042  for( item &it : new_items ) {
3043  if( has_flag( mon_flag_FILTHY ) ) {
3044  if( ( it.is_armor() || it.is_pet_armor() ) && !it.is_gun() ) {
3045  // handle wearable guns as a special case
3046  it.set_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "FILTHY" ) ) );
3047  }
3048  }
3049 
3050  // add stuff that could be worn or strapped to the creature
3051  if( it.is_armor() ) {
3052  corpse->force_insert_item( it, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
3053  }
3054  }
3055

3057  // TODO: disable the backup, only spawn items here that actually fit in something
3058  for( item &it : new_items ) {
3059  // add stuff that could be worn or strapped to the creature
3060  if( !it.is_armor() ) {
3061  std::pair<item_location, item_pocket *> current_best;
3062  for( item *worn_it : corpse->all_items_top() ) {
3063  item_location loc;
3064  std::pair<item_location, item_pocket *> internal_pocket =
3065  worn_it->best_pocket( it, loc, nullptr, false, true );
3066  if( internal_pocket.second != nullptr &&
3067  ( current_best.second == nullptr ||
3068  current_best.second->better_pocket( *internal_pocket.second, it ) ) ) {
3069  current_best = internal_pocket;
3070  }
3071  }
3072  if( current_best.second != nullptr ) {
3073  current_best.second->insert_item( it );
3074  } else {
3075  corpse->force_insert_item( it, pocket_type::CONTAINER );
3076  }
3077  }
3078  }
3079 }

3111 void monster::process_one_effect( effect &it, bool is_new )
3112 {
3113  // Monsters don't get trait-based reduction, but they do get effect based reduction
3114  bool reduced = resists_effect( it );
3115  const auto get_effect = [&it, is_new]( const std::string & arg, bool reduced ) {
3116  if( is_new ) {
3117  return it.get_amount( arg, reduced );
3118  }
3119  return it.get_mod( arg, reduced );
3120  };
3121 
3122  mod_speed_bonus( get_effect( "SPEED", reduced ) );
3123  mod_dodge_bonus( get_effect( "DODGE", reduced ) );
3124  mod_hit_bonus( get_effect( "HIT", reduced ) );
3125  mod_bash_bonus( get_effect( "BASH", reduced ) );
3126  mod_cut_bonus( get_effect( "CUT", reduced ) );
3127  mod_size_bonus( get_effect( "SIZE", reduced ) );
3128 
3129  int val = get_effect( "HURT", reduced );
3130  if( val > 0 ) {
3131  if( is_new || it.activated( calendar::turn, "HURT", val, reduced, 1 ) ) {
3132  apply_damage( it.get_source().resolve_creature(), bodypart_id( "torso" ), val );
3133  }
3134  }
3135 
3136  const efftype_id &id = it.get_id();
3137  // TODO: MATERIALS use fire resistance
3138  if( it.impairs_movement() ) {
3139  effect_cache[MOVEMENT_IMPAIRED] = true;
3140  } else if( id == effect_onfire ) {
3141  int dam = 0;
3142  if( made_of( material_veggy ) ) {
3143  dam = rng( 10, 20 );
3144  } else if( made_of( material_flesh ) || made_of( material_iflesh ) ) {
3145  dam = rng( 5, 10 );
3146  }
3147 
3148  dam -= get_armor_type( damage_heat, bodypart_id( "torso" ) );
3149  if( dam > 0 ) {
3150  apply_damage( it.get_source().resolve_creature(), bodypart_id( "torso" ), dam );
3151  } else {
3152  it.set_duration( 0_turns );
3153  }
3154  } else if( id == effect_run ) {
3155  effect_cache[FLEEING] = true;
3156  } else if( id == effect_no_sight || id == effect_blind ) {
3157  effect_cache[VISION_IMPAIRED] = true;
3158  } else if( ( id == effect_bleed || id == effect_dripping_mechanical_fluid ) &&
3159  x_in_y( it.get_intensity(), it.get_max_intensity() ) ) {
3160  // this is for balance only
3161  it.mod_duration( -rng( 1_turns, it.get_int_dur_factor() / 2 ) );
3162  bleed();
3163  if( id == effect_bleed ) {
3164  // monsters are simplified so they just take damage from bleeding
3165  apply_damage( it.get_source().resolve_creature(), bodypart_id( "torso" ), 1 );
3166  }
3167  } else if( id == effect_fake_common_cold ) {
3168  if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_seconds( rng( 30, 300 ) ) ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
3169  sounds::sound( pos(), 4, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "a hacking cough." ), false, "misc", "cough" );
3170  }
3171 
3172  avatar &you = get_avatar(); // No NPCs for now.
3173  if( rl_dist( pos(), you.pos() ) <= 1 ) {
3174  you.get_sick( false );
3175  }
3176  } else if( id == effect_fake_flu ) {
3177  // Need to define the two separately because it's theoretically (and realistically) possible to have both flu and cold at once, both for players and monsters.
3178  if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_seconds( rng( 30, 300 ) ) ) && one_in( 2 ) ) {
3179  sounds::sound( pos(), 4, sounds::sound_t::speech, _( "a hacking cough." ), false, "misc", "cough" );
3180  }
3181 
3182  avatar &you = get_avatar(); // No NPCs for now.
3183  if( rl_dist( pos(), you.pos() ) <= 1 ) {
3184  you.get_sick( true );
3185  }
3186  }
3187 
3188  //Process enchantments that apply to monsters.
3189  enchantment_cache->clear();
3190 
3191  for( const auto &elem : *effects ) {
3192  for( const enchantment_id &ench_id : elem.first->enchantments ) {
3193  const enchantment &ench = ench_id.obj();
3194  if( ench.is_active( *this ) && ench.is_monster_relevant() ) {
3195  enchantment_cache->force_add( ench, *this );
3196  }
3197  }
3198  }
3199  //Reset max speed
3200  this->set_speed_base( calculate_by_enchantment( this->get_speed_base(), enchant_vals::mod::SPEED,
3201  true ) );
3202 }

3204 void monster::process_effects()
3205 {
3206  // Monster only effects
3207  for( auto &elem : *effects ) {
3208  for( auto &_effect_it : elem.second ) {
3209  process_one_effect( _effect_it.second, false );
3210  }
3211  }
3212 
3213  // Like with player/NPCs - keep the speed above 0
3214  const int min_speed_bonus = -0.75 * get_speed_base();
3215  if( get_speed_bonus() < min_speed_bonus ) {
3216  set_speed_bonus( min_speed_bonus );
3217  }
3218 
3219  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
3220  //If this monster has the ability to heal in combat, do it now.
3221  int regeneration_amount = type->regenerates;
3222  //Apply effect-triggered regeneartion modifiers
3223  for( const auto &regeneration_modifier : type->regeneration_modifiers ) {
3224  if( has_effect( regeneration_modifier.first ) ) {
3225  regeneration_amount += regeneration_modifier.second;
3226  }
3227  }
3228  //Apply enchantment modifiers
3229  regeneration_amount = calculate_by_enchantment( regeneration_amount, enchant_vals::mod::REGEN_HP,
3230  true );
3231  //Prevent negative regeneration
3232  if( regeneration_amount < 0 ) {
3233  regeneration_amount = 0;
3234  }
3235  const int healed_amount = heal( regeneration_amount );
3236  if( healed_amount > 0 && one_in( 2 ) ) {
3237  std::string healing_format_string;
3238  if( healed_amount >= 50 ) {
3239  healing_format_string = _( "The %s is visibly regenerating!" );
3240  } else if( healed_amount >= 10 ) {
3241  healing_format_string = _( "The %s seems a little healthier." );
3242  } else {
3243  healing_format_string = _( "The %s is healing slowly." );
3244  }
3245  add_msg_if_player_sees( *this, m_warning, healing_format_string, name() );
3246  }
3247 
3248  if( type->regenerates_in_dark && !g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
3249  const float light = get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() );
3250  // Magic number 10000 was chosen so that a floodlight prevents regeneration in a range of 20 tiles
3251  const float dHP = 50.0 * std::exp( - light * light / 10000 );
3252  if( heal( static_cast<int>( dHP ) ) > 0 && one_in( 2 ) ) {
3253  add_msg_if_player_sees( *this, m_warning, _( "The %s uses the darkness to regenerate." ), name() );
3254  }
3255  }
3256 
3257  if( has_effect( effect_critter_well_fed ) && one_in( 90 ) ) {
3258  heal( 1 );
3259  }
3260 
3261  //We already check these timers on_load, but adding a random chance for them to go off here
3262  //will make it so that the player needn't leave the area and return for critters to poop,
3263  //become hungry, evolve, have babies, or refill udders.
3264  if( one_in( 30000 ) ) {
3265  try_upgrade( false );
3266  try_reproduce();
3267  try_biosignature();
3268 
3269  if( amount_eaten > 0 ) {
3270  if( has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) ) {
3271  digest_food();
3272  } else {
3273  amount_eaten = 0;
3274  }
3275  }
3276 
3277  if( has_flag( mon_flag_MILKABLE ) ) {
3278  refill_udders();
3279  }
3280  }
3281 
3282  //Monster will regen morale and aggression if it is at/above max HP
3283  //It regens more morale and aggression if is currently fleeing.
3284  if( type->regen_morale && hp >= type->hp ) {
3285  if( is_fleeing( player_character ) ) {
3286  morale = type->morale;
3287  anger = type->agro;
3288  }
3289  if( morale < type->morale ) {
3290  morale += 1;
3291  }
3292  if( anger < type->agro ) {
3293  anger += 1;
3294  }
3295  if( morale < 0 && morale < type->morale ) {
3296  morale += 5;
3297  morale = std::min( morale, type->morale );
3298  }
3299  if( anger < 0 && anger < type->agro ) {
3300  anger += 5;
3301  anger = std::min( anger, type->agro );
3302  }
3303  }
3304 
3305  if( has_flag( mon_flag_CORNERED_FIGHTER ) ) {
3306  map &here = get_map();
3307  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
3308  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), 2 ) ) {
3309  const monster *const mon = creatures.creature_at<monster>( p );
3310  const Character *const guy = creatures.creature_at<Character>( p );
3311  if( mon && mon != this && mon->faction->attitude( faction ) != MFA_FRIENDLY &&
3312  !has_effect( effect_spooked ) && morale <= 0 ) {
3313  if( !has_effect( effect_spooked_recent ) ) {
3314  add_effect( effect_spooked, 3_turns, false );
3315  add_effect( effect_spooked_recent, 9_turns, false );
3316  } else {
3317  if( morale < type->morale ) {
3318  morale = type->morale;
3319  anger = type->agro;
3320  }
3321  }
3322  }
3323  if( guy ) {
3324  monster_attitude att = attitude( guy );
3325  if( ( friendly == 0 ) && ( att == MATT_FOLLOW || att == MATT_FLEE ) &&
3326  !has_effect( effect_spooked ) ) {
3327  if( !has_effect( effect_spooked_recent ) ) {
3328  add_effect( effect_spooked, 3_turns, false );
3329  add_effect( effect_spooked_recent, 9_turns, false );
3330  } else {
3331  if( morale < type->morale ) {
3332  morale = type->morale;
3333  anger = type->agro;
3334  }
3335  }
3336  }
3337  }
3338  }
3339  }
3340 
3341  if( is_nemesis() ) {
3342  add_effect( effect_nemesis_buff, 1000_turns, true );
3343  }
3344 
3345  if( has_flag( mon_flag_PHOTOPHOBIC ) && get_map().ambient_light_at( pos() ) >= 30.0f ) {
3346  add_msg_if_player_sees( *this, m_good, _( "The shadow withers in the light!" ), name() );
3347  add_effect( effect_photophobia, 5_turns, true );
3348  }
3349 
3350  // If this critter dies in sunlight, check & assess damage.
3351  if( has_flag( mon_flag_SUNDEATH ) && g->is_in_sunlight( pos() ) ) {
3352  add_msg_if_player_sees( *this, m_good, _( "The %s burns horribly in the sunlight!" ), name() );
3353  apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 100 );
3354  if( hp < 0 ) {
3355  hp = 0;
3356  }
3357  }
3358 
3359  // Apply or remove the cramped_space effect, which needs specific information about the monster's surroundings.
3360  map &here = get_map();
3361  const tripoint z_pos = pos();
3362  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( z_pos );
3363  if( has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) && !vp.has_value() ) {
3364  remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
3365  }
3366  if( vp.has_value() ) {
3367  vehicle &veh = vp->vehicle();
3368  units::volume capacity = 0_ml;
3369  units::volume free_cargo = 0_ml;
3370  auto cargo_parts = veh.get_parts_at( z_pos, "CARGO", part_status_flag::any );
3371  for( vehicle_part *&part : cargo_parts ) {
3372  vehicle_stack contents = veh.get_items( *part );
3373  const vpart_info &vpinfo = part->info();
3374  if( !vp.part_with_feature( "CARGO_PASSABLE", false ) ) {
3375  capacity += vpinfo.size;
3376  free_cargo += contents.free_volume();
3377  }
3378  }
3379  const creature_size size = get_size();
3380  if( capacity > 0_ml ) {
3381  // Open-topped vehicle parts have more room, and are always free space for fliers.
3382  if( !veh.enclosed_at( z_pos ) ) {
3383  free_cargo *= 1.2;
3384  if( flies() ) {
3385  remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
3386  return;
3387  }
3388  }
3389  if( ( size == creature_size::tiny && free_cargo < 15625_ml ) ||
3390  ( size == creature_size::small && free_cargo < 31250_ml ) ||
3391  ( size == creature_size::medium && free_cargo < 62500_ml ) ||
3392  ( size == creature_size::large && free_cargo < 125000_ml ) ||
3393  ( size == creature_size::huge && free_cargo < 250000_ml ) ) {
3394  if( !has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
3395  add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
3396  }
3397  return;
3398  }
3399  }
3400  if( get_size() == creature_size::huge && !vp.part_with_feature( "AISLE", false ) &&
3401  !vp.part_with_feature( "HUGE_OK", false ) ) {
3402  if( !has_effect( effect_cramped_space ) ) {
3403  add_effect( effect_cramped_space, 2_turns, true );
3404  }
3405  return;
3406  }
3407  remove_effect( effect_cramped_space );
3408  }
3409 
3410  Creature::process_effects();
3411 }

3413 bool monster::make_fungus()
3414 {
3415  if( is_hallucination() ) {
3416  return true;
3417  }
3418  if( type->in_species( species_FUNGUS ) ) { // No friendly-fungalizing ;-)
3419  return true;
3420  }
3421  if( !made_of( material_flesh ) && !made_of( material_hflesh ) &&
3422  !made_of( material_veggy ) && !made_of( material_iflesh ) &&
3423  !made_of( material_bone ) ) {
3424  // No fungalizing robots or weird stuff (mi-gos are technically fungi, blobs are goo)
3425  return true;
3426  }
3427  if( type->has_flag( mon_flag_NO_FUNG_DMG ) ) {
3428  return true; // Return true when monster is immune to fungal damage.
3429  }
3430  if( type->fungalize_into.is_empty() ) {
3431  return false;
3432  }
3433 
3434  const std::string old_name = name();
3435  poly( type->fungalize_into );
3436 
3437  add_msg_if_player_sees( pos(), m_info, _( "The spores transform %1$s into a %2$s!" ),
3438  old_name, name() );
3439 
3440  return true;
3441 }

3590 void monster::init_from_item( item &itm )
3591 {
3592  if( itm.is_corpse() ) {
3593  set_speed_base( get_speed_base() * 0.8 );
3594  const int burnt_penalty = itm.burnt;
3595  hp = static_cast<int>( hp * 0.7 );
3596  if( itm.damage_level() > 0 ) {
3597  set_speed_base( speed_base / ( itm.damage_level() + 1 ) );
3598  hp /= itm.damage_level() + 1;
3599  }
3600 
3601  hp -= burnt_penalty;
3602 
3603  // HP can be 0 or less, in this case revive_corpse will just deactivate the corpse
3604  if( hp > 0 && type->has_flag( mon_flag_REVIVES_HEALTHY ) ) {
3605  hp = type->hp;
3606  set_speed_base( type->speed );
3607  }
3608  // if parent corpse is revives healthy *and* dormant, so will the monster
3609  const mtype *corpse_mtype = itm.get_mtype();
3610  if( hp > 0 && corpse_mtype->has_flag( mon_flag_REVIVES_HEALTHY ) &&
3611  corpse_mtype->has_flag( mon_flag_DORMANT ) ) {
3612  hp = type->hp;
3613  set_speed_base( type->speed );
3614  }
3615  const std::string up_time = itm.get_var( "upgrade_time" );
3616  if( !up_time.empty() ) {
3617  upgrade_time = std::stoi( up_time );
3618  }
3619  for( item *it : itm.all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
3620  if( it->is_armor() ) {
3621  it->set_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "FILTHY" ) ) );
3622  }
3623  inv.push_back( *it );
3624  itm.remove_item( *it );
3625  }
3626  //Move dissectables (installed bionics, etc)
3627  for( item *dissectable : itm.all_items_top( pocket_type::CORPSE ) ) {
3628  dissectable_inv.push_back( *dissectable );
3629  itm.remove_item( *dissectable );
3630  }
3631  } else {
3632  // must be a robot
3633  const int damfac = itm.max_damage() - std::max( 0, itm.damage() ) + 1;
3634  // One hp at least, everything else would be unfair (happens only to monster with *very* low hp),
3635  hp = std::max( 1, hp * damfac / ( itm.max_damage() + 1 ) );
3636  }
3637 }
3638 
3639 item monster::to_item() const
3640 {
3641  if( type->revert_to_itype.is_empty() ) {
3642  return item();
3643  }
3644  // Birthday is wrong, but the item created here does not use it anyway (I hope).
3645  item result( type->revert_to_itype, calendar::turn );
3646  const int damfac = std::max( 1, ( result.max_damage() + 1 ) * hp / type->hp );
3647  result.set_damage( std::max( 0, ( result.max_damage() + 1 ) - damfac ) );
3648  return result;
3649 }

3679 void monster::on_hit( Creature *source, bodypart_id,
3680  float, dealt_projectile_attack const *const proj )
3681 {
3682  if( is_hallucination() ) {
3683  return;
3684  }
3685 
3686  if( rng( 0, 100 ) <= static_cast<int>( type->def_chance ) ) {
3687  type->sp_defense( *this, source, proj );
3688  }
3689 
3690  // Adjust anger/morale of nearby monsters, if they have the appropriate trigger and are friendly
3691  // Keep filtering on the hit monsters' triggers to preserve current functionality
3692  bool trigger = type->has_anger_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED ) ||
3693  type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED ) ||
3694  type->has_placate_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED );
3695 
3696  if( trigger ) {
3697  int light = g->light_level( posz() );
3698  map &here = get_map();
3699  for( monster &critter : g->all_monsters() ) {
3700  // Do we actually care about this faction?
3701  if( critter.faction->attitude( faction ) != MFA_FRIENDLY ) {
3702  continue;
3703  }
3704 
3705  if( here.sees( critter.pos(), pos(), light ) ) {
3706  // Anger trumps fear trumps ennui
3707  if( critter.type->has_anger_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED ) ) {
3708  critter.anger += 15;
3709  if( source != nullptr && !source->is_monster() && !source->is_fake() ) {
3710  // A character attacked our friend
3711  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "%s's character aggro triggered by attacking a friendly %s",
3712  critter.name(), name() );
3713  critter.aggro_character = true;
3714  }
3715  } else if( critter.type->has_fear_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED ) ) {
3716  critter.morale -= 15;
3717  } else if( critter.type->has_placate_trigger( mon_trigger::FRIEND_ATTACKED ) ) {
3718  critter.anger -= 15;
3719  }
3720  }
3721  }
3722  }
3723  if( source != nullptr ) {
3724  if( Character *attacker = source->as_character() ) {
3725  type->families.practice_hit( *attacker );
3726  }
3727  }
3728 
3729  check_dead_state();
3730  // TODO: Faction relations
3731 }

3758 void monster::hear_sound( const tripoint &source, const int vol, const int dist,
3759  bool provocative )
3760 {
3761  if( !can_hear() ) {
3762  return;
3763  }
3764 
3765  const bool goodhearing = has_flag( mon_flag_GOODHEARING );
3766  const int volume = goodhearing ? 2 * vol - dist : vol - dist;
3767  // Error is based on volume, louder sound = less error
3768  if( volume <= 0 ) {
3769  return;
3770  }
3771 
3772  int tmp_provocative = provocative || volume >= normal_roll( 30, 5 );
3773  // already following a more interesting sound
3774  if( provocative_sound && !tmp_provocative && wandf > 0 ) {
3775  return;
3776  }
3777 
3778  int max_error = 0;
3779  if( volume < 2 ) {
3780  max_error = 10;
3781  } else if( volume < 5 ) {
3782  max_error = 5;
3783  } else if( volume < 10 ) {
3784  max_error = 3;
3785  } else if( volume < 20 ) {
3786  max_error = 1;
3787  }
3788 
3789  tripoint_abs_ms target = get_map().getglobal( source ) + point( rng( -max_error, max_error ),
3790  rng( -max_error, max_error ) );
3791  // target_z will require some special check due to soil muffling sounds
3792 
3793  const int wander_turns = volume * ( goodhearing ? 6 : 1 );
3794  // again, already following a more interesting sound
3795  if( wander_turns < wandf ) {
3796  return;
3797  }
3798  // only trigger this if the monster is not friendly or the source isn't the player
3799  if( friendly == 0 || source != get_player_character().pos() ) {
3800  process_trigger( mon_trigger::SOUND, volume );
3801  }
3802  provocative_sound = tmp_provocative;
3803  if( morale >= 0 && anger >= 10 ) {
3804  // TODO: Add a proper check for fleeing attitude
3805  // but cache it nicely, because this part is called a lot
3806  wander_to( target, wander_turns );
3807  } else if( morale < 0 ) {
3808  // Monsters afraid of sound should not go towards sound.
3809  // Move towards a point on the opposite side of us from the target.
3810  // TODO: make the destination scale with the sound and handle
3811  // the case when (x,y) is the same by picking a random direction
3812  tripoint_abs_ms away = get_location() + ( get_location() - target );
3813  away.z() = posz();
3814  wander_to( away, wander_turns );
3815  }
3816 }

3831 bool monster::will_join_horde( int size )
3832 {
3833  const monster_horde_attraction mha = get_horde_attraction();
3834  if( this->has_flag( mon_flag_IMMOBILE ) || this->has_flag( mon_flag_NEVER_WANDER ) ) {
3835  return false; //immobile monsters should never join a horde. Same with Never Wander monsters.
3836  }
3837  if( mha == MHA_NEVER ) {
3838  return false;
3839  }
3840  if( mha == MHA_ALWAYS ) {
3841  return true;
3842  }
3843  if( get_map().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_INDOORS, pos() ) &&
3844  ( mha == MHA_OUTDOORS || mha == MHA_OUTDOORS_AND_LARGE ) ) {
3845  return false;
3846  }
3847  if( size < 3 && ( mha == MHA_LARGE || mha == MHA_OUTDOORS_AND_LARGE ) ) {
3848  return false;
3849  }
3850  return true;
3851 }

3853 void monster::on_unload()
3854 {
3855  last_updated = calendar::turn;
3856 }
3857 
3858 void monster::on_load()
3859 {
3860  try_upgrade( false );
3861  try_reproduce();
3862  try_biosignature();
3863  reset_digestion();
3864 
3865  //Clean up runaway values for monsters which eat but don't digest yet.
3866  if( amount_eaten > 0 ) {
3867  if( has_flag( mon_flag_EATS ) ) {
3868  digest_food();
3869  } else {
3870  amount_eaten = 0;
3871  }
3872  }
3873 
3874  if( has_flag( mon_flag_MILKABLE ) ) {
3875  refill_udders();
3876  }
3877 
3878  const time_duration dt = calendar::turn - last_updated;
3879  last_updated = calendar::turn;
3880  if( dt <= 0_turns ) {
3881  return;
3882  }
3883 
3884  if( morale != type->morale ) { // if works, will put into helper function
3885  int dt_left_m = to_turns<int>( dt );
3886 
3887  if( std::abs( morale - type->morale ) > 15 ) {
3888  const int adjust_by_m = std::min( ( dt_left_m / 4 ),
3889  ( std::abs( morale - type->morale ) - 15 ) );
3890  dt_left_m -= adjust_by_m * 4;
3891  if( morale < type->morale ) {
3892  morale += adjust_by_m;
3893  } else {
3894  morale -= adjust_by_m;
3895  }
3896  }
3897 
3898  // Avoiding roll_remainder - PC out of situation, monster can calm down
3899  if( morale < type->morale ) {
3900  morale += std::min( static_cast<int>( std::ceil( dt_left_m / 8.0 ) ),
3901  std::abs( morale - type->morale ) );
3902  } else {
3903  morale -= std::min( ( dt_left_m / 8 ),
3904  std::abs( morale - type->morale ) );
3905  }
3906  }
3907  if( anger != type->agro ) {
3908  int dt_left_a = to_turns<int>( dt );
3909 
3910  if( std::abs( anger - type->agro ) > 15 ) {
3911  const int adjust_by_a = std::min( ( dt_left_a / 4 ),
3912  ( std::abs( anger - type->agro ) - 15 ) );
3913  dt_left_a -= adjust_by_a * 4;
3914  if( anger < type->agro ) {
3915  anger += adjust_by_a;
3916  } else {
3917  anger -= adjust_by_a;
3918  }
3919  }
3920 
3921  if( anger > type->agro ) {
3922  anger -= std::min( static_cast<int>( std::ceil( dt_left_a / 8.0 ) ),
3923  std::abs( anger - type->agro ) );
3924  } else {
3925  anger += std::min( ( dt_left_a / 8 ),
3926  std::abs( anger - type->agro ) );
3927  }
3928  // If we got angry at characters have a chance at calming down
3929  if( aggro_character && !type->aggro_character && !x_in_y( anger, 100 ) ) {
3930  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "%s's character aggro reset", name() );
3931  aggro_character = false;
3932  }
3933  }
3934 
3935  // TODO: regen_morale
3936  float regen = type->regenerates;
3937  if( regen <= 0 ) {
3938  if( has_flag( mon_flag_REVIVES ) && !has_flag( mon_flag_DORMANT ) ) {
3939  regen = 0.02f * type->hp / to_turns<int>( 1_hours );
3940  } else if( made_of( material_flesh ) || made_of( material_iflesh ) ||
3941  made_of( material_veggy ) ) {
3942  // Most living stuff here
3943  regen = 0.005f * type->hp / to_turns<int>( 1_hours );
3944  }
3945  }
3946  const int heal_amount = roll_remainder( regen * to_turns<int>( dt ) );
3947  const int healed = heal( heal_amount );
3948  int healed_speed = 0;
3949  if( get_speed_base() < type->speed ) {
3950  const int old_speed = get_speed_base();
3951  if( hp >= type->hp ) {
3952  set_speed_base( type->speed );
3953  } else {
3954  const int speed_delta = std::max( healed * type->speed / type->hp, 1 );
3955  set_speed_base( std::min( old_speed + speed_delta, type->speed ) );
3956  }
3957  healed_speed = get_speed_base() - old_speed;
3958  }
3959 
3960  // Update special attacks' cooldown
3961  for( const auto &sp_type : type->special_attacks ) {
3962  const std::string &special_name = sp_type.first;
3963  const auto local_iter = special_attacks.find( special_name );
3964  if( local_iter == special_attacks.end() ) {
3965  continue;
3966  }
3967  mon_special_attack &local_attack_data = local_iter->second;
3968  if( !local_attack_data.enabled ) {
3969  continue;
3970  }
3971 
3972  if( local_attack_data.cooldown > 0 ) {
3973  local_attack_data.cooldown = std::max( 0, local_attack_data.cooldown - to_turns<int>( dt ) );
3974  }
3975  }
3976 
3977  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_MONSTER, "on_load() by %s, %d turns, healed %d hp, %d speed",
3978  name(), to_turns<int>( dt ), healed, healed_speed );
3979 }

3986 std::unordered_set<tripoint> monster::get_path_avoid() const
3987 {
3988  std::unordered_set<tripoint> ret;
3989 
3990  map &here = get_map();
3991  int radius = std::min( sight_range( here.ambient_light_at( pos() ) ), 5 );
3992 
3993  for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos(), radius ) ) {
3994  if( !can_move_to( p ) ) {
3995  if( bash_skill() <= 0 || !here.is_bashable( p ) ) {
3996  ret.insert( p );
3997  }
3998  }
3999  }
4000 
4001  if( has_flag( mon_flag_PRIORITIZE_TARGETS ) ) {
4002  radius = 2;
4003  } else if( has_flag( mon_flag_PATH_AVOID_DANGER_1 ) ||
4004  has_flag( mon_flag_PATH_AVOID_DANGER_2 ) ) {
4005  radius = 1;
4006  } else {
4007  return ret;
4008  }
4009  for( Creature *critter : here.get_creatures_in_radius( pos(), radius ) ) {
4010  ret.insert( critter->pos() );
4011  }
4012 
4013  return ret;
4014 }

4016 double monster::calculate_by_enchantment( double modify, enchant_vals::mod value,
4017  bool round_output ) const
4018 {
4019  modify += enchantment_cache->get_value_add( value );
4020  modify *= 1.0 + enchantment_cache->get_value_multiply( value );
4021  if( round_output ) {
4022  modify = std::round( modify );
4023  }
4024  return modify;
4025 }
